story:
Who We Are

 

The BlissNinny AiryFairy WooWoo Wellness Center is a healing & meditation center based in North Chicagoland. 

Our goal is to provide classes and services that help others understand and grow from their life experiences. We believe in:

Oneness Perspective: We recognize that all of life is a unique expression of the same Divine whole. 

Neutrality: The deliberate, conscious stance of nonjudgement.

Free Will: An awareness of the fact that we alone are responsible for the expression of our lives.

Being Conscious: We practice a body-centric meditation to help us live consciously and comfortably within our own skin. 

Assume Love: We all are doing the best we can in the moment. 

Honesty: We promote authenticity and integrity. 

Playfulness: To quote Joe Dirt, "Life is a garden. Dig it."

Conscious Altruism: We encourage supporting others on their journey from an internal wellspring of compassion, not from a sense of external obligation, expectation, or a hope of reward or recognition. 

Education: We have decades of spiritual learning and experimentation narrowed down to tools and techniques that work. And we love to share them. 

Meet the Team

Judi Hendricks, Chief Energy Oscillator (CEO): Born a full-blown touch empath with her psychic abilities up and running, Judi Hendricks spent the first 30 years of her life studying any psychological or energetic discipline she could find to learn to master her own "gifts." Having achieved a modicum of success in that, she spent the next three decades teaching and healing healers. An Interfaith Minister, Reiki Master and crystal healer with an international clientele, she thinks of her vocation as "Psychospirituality," teaches in-body meditation, energy, crystal, and sound healing, and offers private clairvoyant sessions to support the sensitive psychics she thinks of as the world's "canaries." 

Chris Bourgeois, Director of Operations is a certified Reiki Master, energy healer, artisan, entrepreneur and practicing clairvoyant. Having completed courses in the Silva Mind Control Method and received certification as a hypnotherapist, Chris' longing for self-improvement and life-long interest in spirituality and the metaphysical has always been her guiding light. In 2008, she began taking meditation classes and working her energy with Judi Hendricks and has been enjoying self-growth and conscious living ever since. An avid reader, she credits her love of mysteries with her ability to notice details and keep organized. She is a collector of crystals and paper and makes art out of her in-home studio, Paper Goddess Studios.  

Annette Wisniewski, Director of Programming and Learning Strategy is an international consultant, trainer, author, editor, publisher, musician, professional speaker, pet parent, and proud mom. As a learning strategist, she helps people build knowledge and skills and develop positive outlooks; as a human performance technologist, she helps companies remove performance barriers and establish support systems to enable their employees to thrive; as a spiritual healer, she applies what she knows about learning and development and what she has learned along her own spiritual journey to help others connect more fully with their higher selves - and to have fun along the way.

Ryan Herrick, Director of Abundance is a musician, humanitarian, spiritual activist, teacher, healer and homebuilder. Based in North Chicagoland by way of New England, Ryan sojourned to the Midwest to deepen his work as a healer and clairvoyant with Judi Hendricks, Rev. in 2015. No matter the task, Ryan seeks Spirit in all things, and his expanded perspective helps him to create, teach, and heal from a cleaner, more neutral space of compassion. He loves dogs, the outdoors, psychology, and carries a deep passion for Native American rights and advocacy. 

 

Together, we are synthesizing our years of experience and working to harmonize as a beautiful whole in the creation of the BlissNinny AiryFairy Woo Woo Wellness Center.

 

We have decades of learning narrowed down to specific tools that work, and we love to share them with others.

 

We are an urban, suburban, and rural retreat center, offering a refuge and community, weekly throughout the year.

 

The world is getting more and more complex each day. We are creating a place to retreat from the chaos into relaxation and inner wellness, offering ways to bridge this newfound ease into your everyday life until it becomes your new normal.

 

We are bringing over 100 years of combined experience to provide comprehensive emotional and mental wellness services, both one-on-one to individual clients and groups.

 

We primarily teach spiritual tools that impart valuable and practical ways of living in this world now. Among these tools are both time-tested rituals and innovative, leading-edge techniques.

Working as a team. Judi, Chris, Annette, Ryan, and Rory will provide a multitude of services, including the following:

  • Energy Healing including Reiki

  • Psychic Readings

  • Tarot Readings

  • Sound Healing

  • Guided Meditation

  • Spiritual Workshops

  • Personal Breakthroughs

  • Manifestation Tools

  • NLP Training

  • Mindfulness Education

  • Trauma Protocols

  • Core Transformation

  • Community events

  • And more!

 

We have been working tirelessly since February 2019 to make this dream a reality.  Since discussions regarding this idea began, we have drafted our vision and mission statement, as well as a business plan, laying out the framework for The BlissNinny AiryFairy WooWoo Wellness Center and the numerous ways we will support our clients and expand our community.  

 

The Road So Far...

 

  • Consulted with lawyers to lay the groundwork for the legal structure of our business; operating agreements, waivers, and all pertinent legal documents, including trademarks.
  • Established the BlissNinny AiryFairy WooWoo Wellness Center, LLC as a legal business entity in the State of Illinois on November 19th, 2019.
  • Created a social networking presence on Facebook and Instagram @blissninnywellness.
  • Began developing an official website (http://blissninnywellness.com) that will allow for online booking and convenient access to up-to-date information about our extensive offerings.

 

We've set our goal at $10,000 for start up costs; which include business consultation fees; LLC formation fees; web hosting and scheduling; marketing; office supplies such as stationary, incense, candles, water, toilet paper, and kleenex; and design services. We want to grow!

 

How You Can Help:

 

For years, we have been nurturing community by empowering individuals.

 

We place value in growth and kinship-- and through your contribution, you are supporting our growth as a fully-functioning, brick-and-mortar healing and wellness center, as well as in cultivating human connection and facilitating the healing of others.

 

Please join us for the ride!

 

We appreciate any amount of support you are willing to give, whether financially or simply through sharing this project with your friends and family. 

Take a peek at the list of perks to the right of the page, and if any of them call out to you, feel free to select them and get ready to receive! 

Contributors should think of their donations as pre-paying for our services at a deep discount, while taking a step on their path to wellness. Every penny that is donated here will go to building the foundation of the BlissNinny AiryFairy WooWoo Wellness Center and creating a space where our community can connect, expand, and most importantly, be well. Thank you very much for taking the time to visit our page, learning more about the BlissNinny AiryFairy WooWoo Wellness Center, and contributing to our campaign!

Sharing is caring~ Please share this project with your friends, family, and communities!
story_txt:
Who We Are The BlissNinny AiryFairy WooWoo Wellness Center is a healing & meditation center based in North Chicagoland. Our goal is to provide classes and services that help others understand and grow from their life experiences. We believe in:Oneness Perspective: We recognize that all of life is a unique expression of the same Divine whole. Neutrality: The deliberate, conscious stance of nonjudgement.Free Will: An awareness of the fact that we alone are responsible for the expression of our lives.Being Conscious: We practice a body-centric meditation to help us live consciously and comfortably within our own skin. Assume Love: We all are doing the best we can in the moment. Honesty: We promote authenticity and integrity. Playfulness: To quote Joe Dirt, "Life is a garden. Dig it."Conscious Altruism: We encourage supporting others on their journey from an internal wellspring of compassion, not from a sense of external obligation, expectation, or a hope of reward or recognition. Education: We have decades of spiritual learning and experimentation narrowed down to tools and techniques that work. And we love to share them. Meet the TeamJudi Hendricks, Chief Energy Oscillator (CEO): Born a full-blown touch empath with her psychic abilities up and running, Judi Hendricks spent the first 30 years of her life studying any psychological or energetic discipline she could find to learn to master her own "gifts." Having achieved a modicum of success in that, she spent the next three decades teaching and healing healers. An Interfaith Minister, Reiki Master and crystal healer with an international clientele, she thinks of her vocation as "Psychospirituality," teaches in-body meditation, energy, crystal, and sound healing, and offers private clairvoyant sessions to support the sensitive psychics she thinks of as the world's "canaries." Chris Bourgeois, Director of Operations is a certified Reiki Master, energy healer, artisan, entrepreneur and practicing clairvoyant. Having completed courses in the Silva Mind Control Method and received certification as a hypnotherapist, Chris' longing for self-improvement and life-long interest in spirituality and the metaphysical has always been her guiding light. In 2008, she began taking meditation classes and working her energy with Judi Hendricks and has been enjoying self-growth and conscious living ever since. An avid reader, she credits her love of mysteries with her ability to notice details and keep organized. She is a collector of crystals and paper and makes art out of her in-home studio, Paper Goddess Studios.  Annette Wisniewski, Director of Programming and Learning Strategy is an international consultant, trainer, author, editor, publisher, musician, professional speaker, pet parent, and proud mom. As a learning strategist, she helps people build knowledge and skills and develop positive outlooks; as a human performance technologist, she helps companies remove performance barriers and establish support systems to enable their employees to thrive; as a spiritual healer, she applies what she knows about learning and development and what she has learned along her own spiritual journey to help others connect more fully with their higher selves - and to have fun along the way.Ryan Herrick, Director of Abundance is a musician, humanitarian, spiritual activist, teacher, healer and homebuilder. Based in North Chicagoland by way of New England, Ryan sojourned to the Midwest to deepen his work as a healer and clairvoyant with Judi Hendricks, Rev. in 2015. No matter the task, Ryan seeks Spirit in all things, and his expanded perspective helps him to create, teach, and heal from a cleaner, more neutral space of compassion. He loves dogs, the outdoors, psychology, and carries a deep passion for Native American rights and advocacy.  Together, we are synthesizing our years of experience and working to harmonize as a beautiful whole in the creation of the BlissNinny AiryFairy Woo Woo Wellness Center. We have decades of learning narrowed down to specific tools that work, and we love to share them with others. We are an urban, suburban, and rural retreat center, offering a refuge and community, weekly throughout the year. The world is getting more and more complex each day. We are creating a place to retreat from the chaos into relaxation and inner wellness, offering ways to bridge this newfound ease into your everyday life until it becomes your new normal. We are bringing over 100 years of combined experience to provide comprehensive emotional and mental wellness services, both one-on-one to individual clients and groups. We primarily teach spiritual tools that impart valuable and practical ways of living in this world now. Among these tools are both time-tested rituals and innovative, leading-edge techniques.Working as a team. Judi, Chris, Annette, Ryan, and Rory will provide a multitude of services, including the following:
Energy Healing including Reiki
Psychic Readings
Tarot Readings
Sound Healing
Guided Meditation
Spiritual Workshops
Personal Breakthroughs
Manifestation Tools
NLP Training
Mindfulness Education
Trauma Protocols
Core Transformation
Community events
And more!
 We have been working tirelessly since February 2019 to make this dream a reality.  Since discussions regarding this idea began, we have drafted our vision and mission statement, as well as a business plan, laying out the framework for The BlissNinny AiryFairy WooWoo Wellness Center and the numerous ways we will support our clients and expand our community.   The Road So Far... 
Consulted with lawyers to lay the groundwork for the legal structure of our business; operating agreements, waivers, and all pertinent legal documents, including trademarks.
Established the BlissNinny AiryFairy WooWoo Wellness Center, LLC as a legal business entity in the State of Illinois on November 19th, 2019.
Created a social networking presence on Facebook and Instagram @blissninnywellness.
Began developing an official website (http://blissninnywellness.com) that will allow for online booking and convenient access to up-to-date information about our extensive offerings.
 We've set our goal at $10,000 for start up costs; which include business consultation fees; LLC formation fees; web hosting and scheduling; marketing; office supplies such as stationary, incense, candles, water, toilet paper, and kleenex; and design services. We want to grow! How You Can Help: For years, we have been nurturing community by empowering individuals. We place value in growth and kinship-- and through your contribution, you are supporting our growth as a fully-functioning, brick-and-mortar healing and wellness center, as well as in cultivating human connection and facilitating the healing of others. Please join us for the ride! We appreciate any amount of support you are willing to give, whether financially or simply through sharing this project with your friends and family. Take a peek at the list of perks to the right of the page, and if any of them call out to you, feel free to select them and get ready to receive! Contributors should think of their donations as pre-paying for our services at a deep discount, while taking a step on their path to wellness. Every penny that is donated here will go to building the foundation of the BlissNinny AiryFairy WooWoo Wellness Center and creating a space where our community can connect, expand, and most importantly, be well. Thank you very much for taking the time to visit our page, learning more about the BlissNinny AiryFairy WooWoo Wellness Center, and contributing to our campaign!Sharing is caring~ Please share this project with your friends, family, and communities!

story:
Once upon a time, there was an alcoholic stuck in a hole. Everyone he knew came and tried to get him out of the hole - his siblings, friends, a Priest, Mom, Dad, Wife and Kids, but no one could get him out.  Along comes another alcoholic. He sees the man and jumps in the hole. The alcoholic who was in the hole says, "Why did you do that? Now we are both stuck down here.” The alcoholic that jumped in says, "It's okay. I’ve been here, and I know the way out."

INTRO

Hi, my name is Tony. I am an artist and interactive designer. I have also been sober one day at a time for the last 10 years. I have attended hundreds - if not thousands - of 12 Step meetings in numerous states and a few countries both online and in-person. I have met a lot of wonderful people, made some great friends, and even helped some newcomers along the way. Without the meetings and fellowship of other people in recovery, I would not be sober today.

There are recovery meetings that meet regularly in nearly every community around the world and most of these recovery meetings have not met in person since this COVID-19 outbreak. That is why this project is so important to every community.

THE NEED

Meetings and fellowship are essential to the recovery of millions of alcoholics and addicts. 

  • In the US, there are 66,345 active groups with 1,361,838 members that have regular meetings. (aa.org)

  • Worldwide, there are 125,352 groups and 2,130,419 members.(aa.org)

  • Additional recovery groups that need a solution ACOA, ALANON, Narcotics Anonymous, Gamblers Anonymous, Overeaters Anonymous and more.

  • In 2017, approximately 19.7 million people aged 12 or older had a substance use disorder (https://www.samhsa.gov/)

  • First Responders are at a higher risk for substance abuse just because of the incredibly high stress circumstances they encounter daily. (https://www.samhsa.gov/)

  • Veterans have a higher risk of substance abuse. According to a 2013 survey 1 in 15 Veterans had a substance use disorder in the previous year. (https://www.samhsa.gov/)

  • Recovery programs that can no longer meet in person can also use this platform.

Online meetings have been - and will continue to be - an important tool for the recovery community - not just for the current pandemic, but for countless folks that struggle to find recovery meetings in their area. Some folks want to attend meetings and can’t drive, work off peak hours, or are on house arrest. Some older members just have a hard time getting around, but want to remain active in the recovery community. There are also folks that are released from prison that could use a sober peer support network to adjust to a new productive sober life.

The current online meeting platforms lack the functionality and formatting needs of the recovery community. People can spend countless hours searching for online recovery meetings while navigating homemade websites. Smaller communities may not even offer recovery resources or meetings. MeetingMakersClub.com will be the number one place to go for online recovery meetings.

    THE SOLUTION

    MeetingMakersClub.com will host live video meetings with tools and features specifically for the recovery community. We will not record or share or sell any member information. Who you see here, what you hear here, when you leave here, let it stay here. Anonymity and confidentiality is tremendously important.

    • Recovery Meetings 24 hours a day 365 days a year, from anywhere in the world.
    • Members create the meetings for any addiction, any time in any language.
    • Pass the Basket to collect donations. Meeting creators determine where the funds go.
    • Search functionality will allow members to search by local time, location, topic and receive reminders.
    • Messaging feature to allow members to communicate after the meetings.
    • Profiles will allow members to track their sobriety, and find a support network.
    • Game mechanics will encourage members to participate in their recovery.
    • Icons and color codes to give members information to assist them in recovery.
      • Military service icon
      • Sobriety date
      • Sponsor status icon
      • and more.
    • Peer support and sponsorship are important to build trust and a support network.
    • NATIONWIDE FIRST RESPONDERS PORTAL. First Responders can have recovery meetings with other first responders. ANONYMOUS & CONFIDENTIAL.
    • RECOVERY CENTER PORTAL. Password secure, anonymous and confidential meetings for IOP, and outpatient, and alumni. ANONYMOUS & CONFIDENTIAL.
    • ANONYMITY & CONFIDENTIALITY are key. We will make sure that meeting are protected.
    • DIAL-IN option for folks that don't have access to a computer, smart phone or internet.

    YOUR HELP IS NEEDED

    I am asking for 15K to get this project started. Early estimates have ranged from 15K to 40K. YIKES! 15K will allow me to build the core of the platform, start hosting meetings, handle the legal stuff, and do some marketing. The goal is to have all the primary features in the first version of the platform, the secondary features may have to come later.

    • 10K Development
      • Primary Features
        • Secure site
        • Live video meetings
        • Search functionality
        • Sign up onboarding functionality
        • Meeting link and share functionality
        • Donation functionality for meetings
      • Secondary Features
        • Document uploading/link
        • Meeting information upload
        • User profile with icons and color codes
        • Messaging
        • Chair sign-up
        • First responders portal
        • Dial-in functionality
      • Stretch Features/Promotion (if we go beyond the goal)
        • Additional marketing
        • Closed captioning
        • FREE set up for all meetings in all communities
    • 2K Marketing
    • 1K-2K Fees and Legal

    Still to be done:

    • Finalize design and functionality.
    • Determine which features can be included in the first version.
    • Design gamification system.
    • Secure development team.

     

    If you're not able to donate, you can still help by sharing this campaign with as many of your friends and family as possible. Alcoholism and addiction impact every community.

     

    This project is not affiliated or endorsed by Alcoholics Anonymous or any other recovery program or institution. Special thanks to Reboots Podcast, and  12 Steps Illustrated.

story:
what is rōm yoga? 

the intention 

We believe in good, clean, fun yoga.

If you want to be on your mat, we want you to be. Whatever the reason. Whoever you are. Wherever you're at. You can take classes near you or host a class of your own. rōm is there when you need it-uncomplicated, joyful, and available.

the classes

We teach power and strength-based vinyasa classes to get you moving. We love to breathe, sweat, and challenge ourselves to find the rhythm of each flow. Our classes are fueled by thoughtfully curated playlists and good vibes.  

Visit our site for the low-down on all details! 

the founder - jasmine m  (that's me!) 

Never in a million years did I expect to be teaching yoga. I didn’t know what yoga was (who actually does?) and I almost died through my first heated class. I was grumpy too often, I stretched too little…so how did I end up here? 

In 2013, I somehow ended up in teacher training and decided it wouldn't hurt to teach. It was fun. I had no idea what I was doing, but I enjoyed it...however, about a year in something shifted and I fell in love. I realized that if you took away the studio, the poses, the cues...you were left with the incredible energy of total strangers. 

It’s funny how big your community gets when you take a moment to stop and take it in. People with different backgrounds, intentions, and journeys all coming together to be apart of something outside of themselves…it's bananas. 

We have infinite opportunities to move and to connect if we seize them. For me, yoga has been about the people that it has brought into my life. For you, it may be something different. Together, we can celebrate it all.

the studio space (the reason for funds!) 

rōm is partnering with Yoga4410, a local yin and restorative studio, to create Bethesda Yoga Co-op. rōm will use the studio as its home base to host daily classes in addition to the regular pop-up classes planned at locations (businesses/homes) across the city. 

The co-op will serve as a wellness space to connect the community through quality yoga/meditation classes for varying practices. With the power-based flows of rōm and the healing yin style of Yoga4410, students can expect a well-rounded and full yoga experience. 

Building rōm and Bethesda Yoga Co-op together has been beyond fun, but the bills add up quickly. We are seeking support to fund initial rental costs, equipment (mats, blocks, and straps), and other start-up expenses that occur when creating a business.

Bethesda Yoga Co-op is located inside of PureRyde Pilates within Bethesda’s Bradley Shopping Center (address). free parking, ya’ll.

The studio opens November 15. breathe in...breathe out...

what else...

Yoga has become a huge part of our current culture and it’s flipping awesome. Strangers come together, each with a different story, to move around and breathe side-by-side. No matter the reason for being on the mat, people show up and we think that’s pretty cool. Our hope is to cultivate growth and connection within individuals and our pack. 

The dream is to create a culture energized by community. All intentions welcome. 

ways to get involved 

  • follow us on instagram and facebook! 
  • tell everyone you meet - friends, family, randoms... 
  • send all of the good vibes

story: The Giving Bowl serves lovingly prepared, organic plant-based cuisine that is both good for the body and the planet. Our ingredients come from local, organic farms, thereby reducing our carbon footprint and ensuring that meals are made from the freshest, non-GMO ingredients. In the spirit of “Let food be thy medicine,” we inspire vitality and wellness by bringing you nourishing, flavorful meals. We opened our beautiful pink food truck over a year ago and it has been an overwhelming success! So give generously and help us bring The Giving Bowl to locations near you. And remember, you are helping children in need with your generous donation.

story:
As Founder of Sat Nam Spirit Center of Sedona, I have been offering classes and workshops through difference locations for more than 4 years. My goal as been to create an affordable, non-competitive environment that is safe emotionally, physically, and spiritually for as many people as possible no matter what their limits or situation. This includes the elderly, the very young, the physically or mentally challenged, veterans and those in 12 step programs. And those in financial need.

Thanks to all your support, Sat Nam Spirit Center found a home of it’s own and has been going strong since January 1st. Now we are expanding to the adjoining unit to fulfill more of our mission by providing healing rooms as well as a small store and extra space.

Another important aspect of Sat Nam Spirit Center is community. It’s been very important to me from the start. And it’s been very heartwarming to see a loving, healing, and nurturing community grow. As part of the community experience, we aspire to make time and space for those who want to offer their services and teachings or share their art and books at the center. I encourage those with services or events to bring fliers and make announcements. We also have special times where students bring in their art and books to share and sell. We even have someone bring in eggs from her chickens to sell. In this way, we support each other in our lives and in following our true path, our Sat Nam.

We sincerely appreciate any offering you can make!!

And special thanks to the Sat Nam team who helped make this happen: Robin Weeks, Clare Fritz, Rob Curtis, Kim Grill, Sandy Gassett, Anya Cameron, Wendy the Weaver, Jill Cross, Annette and Kerry Dunker, Tracy Berrian, John and Rayna Griffin, and many more.

AND many thanks Ron and Angelo at sedonamediaservices.com for their video services.

Namaste, Naomi Rose

 

Short Summary

Your donation will help us expand Sat Nam Spirit Center of Sedona's HOME and services.  A center for offerings of classes and healing for body mind spirit at economical prices for ALL.  Many of Naomi's students and others have donated some great prizes as a reward for your donation. See the Perks we are offering in the panel to the right! (Click on the image to see more description.)

Donate whatever you can and more important – come to your first class!  You won’t regret it!

See Testimonials here: https://youtu.be/zjBzXPDOihQ

What We Need 

Our goal is $3000.  

This will help fund the beginning of a HOME of our own.

  • Rent and rental deposit for the 2nd space
  • Signage and permits
  • Promotional materials
  • Equipment and furniture
  • Soundproofing and other minor remodels
  • Scholarships for those in financial need

What You Get

A down to earth, affordable spiritual center right here in Sedona!!!

Perks for donating.  See below. Note: click on the image of the perk for more info.

The Impact

  • Sat Nam Spirit Center of Sedona aims to help each of us awaken to & act from our true nature (our Sat Nam). In this way, we help bring  health & wellbeing to ourselves & the world.

  • Our world needs healing.  People need healing, affordable healing.  We want to provide affordable healing to as many people as possible.  Especially those who are overlooked in our society.   ​
  • Naomi has been teaching yoga consistently for four years in Sedona and has created a large following of dedicated students who have greatly benefited from her offerings.

Risks & Challenges

There is plenty of competition in Sedona for healing centers, however, this is different because we offer our services at a lesser price so that everyone can join the healing!  We are going to need a bigger space and a permanent space because of this large and growing following. 

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Tell everyone about the new Sat Nam Spirit Center and how it will make a difference.
  • Tell people about our Indiegogo campaign.  
  • Like our Facebook page: www.facebook.com/satnamspiritcenter

In this way, we support each other in our lives and in following our true path, our Sat Nam.

We sincerely appreciate any offering you can make!!
And special thanks to the Sat Nam team who helped make this happen: Robin Weeks, Clare Fritz, Rob Curtis, Kim Grill, Sandy Gassett, Anya Cameron, Wendy the Weaver, Jill Cross, Annette and Kerry Dunker, Tracy Berrian, John and Rayna Griffin, and many more.
AND many thanks Ron and Angelo at sedonamediaservices.com for their video services.
Namaste, Naomi Rose
 
Short Summary
Your donation will help us expand Sat Nam Spirit Center of Sedona's HOME and services.  A center for offerings of classes and healing for body mind spirit at economical prices for ALL.  Many of Naomi's students and others have donated some great prizes as a reward for your donation. See the Perks we are offering in the panel to the right! (Click on the image to see more description.)
Donate whatever you can and more important – come to your first class!  You won’t regret it!
See Testimonials here: https://youtu.be/zjBzXPDOihQ

What We Need 
Our goal is $3000.  
This will help fund the beginning of a HOME of our own.

Rent and rental deposit for the 2nd space
Signage and permits
Promotional materials
Equipment and furniture
Soundproofing and other minor remodels
Scholarships for those in financial need


What You Get
A down to earth, affordable spiritual center right here in Sedona!!!
Perks for donating.  See below. Note: click on the image of the perk for more info.
The Impact

Sat Nam Spirit Center of Sedona aims to help each of us awaken to & act from our true nature (our Sat Nam). In this way, we help bring  health & wellbeing to ourselves & the world.
Our world needs healing.  People need healing, affordable healing.  We want to provide affordable healing to as many people as possible.  Especially those who are overlooked in our society.   ​

Naomi has been teaching yoga consistently for four years in Sedona and has created a large following of dedicated students who have greatly benefited from her offerings.


Risks & Challenges
There is plenty of competition in Sedona for healing centers, however, this is different because we offer our services at a lesser price so that everyone can join the healing!  We are going to need a bigger space and a permanent space because of this large and growing following. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Tell everyone about the new Sat Nam Spirit Center and how it will make a difference.
Tell people about our Indiegogo campaign.  
Like our Facebook page: www.facebook.com/satnamspiritcenter

story:
Overview

  • Do you ever feel like your charitable giving isn't making a difference in the world?
  • Do you wish there was a way you could see and feel the impact your generosity?
  • Or do you simply want to know that your life is making a difference to others?

 

Glow is on a mission to unleash more joy and generosity into the world! We combine the power of community, storytelling, and technology with the science of generosity to help people increase their impact in the world and improve their lives.

⚡️Daily tips to cultivate generosity and increase joy in your everyday

⚡️Experience the power of a charitable Superfund and help give away over $1 billion a year

⚡️Read and follow along with every story and project funded

 

We're literally building the worlds first app that is designed to increase your impact in the world.

DO GOOD • FEEL GOOD • CHANGE THE WORLD

 

1. The Superfund

The Glow Superfund is a whole new way to give that literally allows everyday people (like us) to have more impact in the world! Imagine experiencing the joy of philanthropy at a billionaire scale? 

⚡️Turn your small donation into millions of dollars every month

⚡️Support 1000's of the best charities, doing the best work, all throughout the world

⚡️Follow the stories of every project funded

 

It's like a mutual fund for charitable giving!

 

 

WHAT IS SUPERFUNDING?

Superfunding is a new category of charitable giving built on a community of people with shared values and interests, that combine their financial resources for greater IMPACT. 

 

 

HOW DOES VOTING WORK?

Fund categories include: Eradicating extreme poverty; Quality education; Clean water and sanitation; The environment; Disaster relief; Innovation; Health and curing disease.

 

 

WATCH EXPLAINER VIDEO

 

 

2. The Daily Glow

Receive daily notifications with short, easy-to-follow activities that are designed to help you cultivate radical generosity towards yourself, others and the world! Track the results and measure the impact. On average people report feeling 60% more joy after completing a #dailyglow.

 

⚡️Set notifications and receive the daily glow at the best time for you

⚡️Opt-in to daily glow's around specific topics (mindfulness, gratitude, purpose etc) 

⚡️Participate with friends and encourage others

 

 

3. Inspiring Storytelling

Be inspired by curated news, stories, video, blogs and updates that put you in a good mood and make you want to celebrate life. Throw away all the negative vibes from your current news apps and social media feeds! The Glow app will keep you updated on all the good happening around the world, the latest grants, and updates from the Superfund, along with stories you care about and find interesting. 

 

 
 

There are a bunch of reasons why we've decided to build Glow, but the biggest reason of all is because we wholeheartedly believe that radical generosity CAN CHANGE THE WORLD. We believe in doing good, and that we should care for the earth and those within it. We value diversity, equality, and think everyone should have the opportunity to build a better life.

Here are some things we hope to change:

  • End to the "ugh". That feeling you get when giving to charity and think your gift won't make much of a difference!
  • Boot depression. Since 2013 depression has risen 46% among millennials because we're surrounded by negativity, trapped by constant comparisons and a societal rise in individualism and narcissism.
  • Close the black hole. When we give to charity, most of the time we never hear the stories and therefore don't get to experience the joy of giving.

 

 

WE WANT HISTORY TO REMEMBER OUR GENERATION AS THE MOST GENEROUS OF THEM ALL

 

 

 

The secret behind Glow is the understanding of the science of generosity and it's unbelievable power to improve our lives. 

As we learn to be generous towards ourselves, others and the world, we unlock more joy.

A May 2018 white paper by the Greater Good Science Center at UC Berkeley, which compiled hundreds of studies concluded that generosity:

 

 

 

Our goal for this campaign is to raise at least $20,000 in order to begin building the app. Funds raised will go towards UX/UI design and engineering of the first simplified version of the app (beta) which we hope to release in early 2020.

 

 

Stretch Goals

We anticipate the total cost of building the app will be around $120,000. If this campaign goes well and we raise over the initial goal of $20,000 we will be able to build additional and more features that will enhance the user experience.

 

 

We're excited to offer some "never seen before perks" that are made possible by the power of a superfund.

OUR PERKS INCLUDE

1) A Matching Donation: Up to 10X to your favorite charity! At perk level BLUE and above you'll get to nominate your favorite charity and at some point over the next two years, Glow will make a donation to that charity in your name. How awesome is that! This will only happen during our Indiegogo campaign and never be repeated again. The charity must be a US 501c3 registered non-profit and cannot be a school or place of worship. (When the campaign ends we will send a charity nomination form).

2) In-App Level Upgrades: When using the app you will receive points for participating in Daily Glow activities, inviting friends, sharing stories on social and many different types of engagement. These points will level you up within the app that will unlock rewards like discounts on adventure travel and products by partner brands as well as other community-related perks.

3) Gift Cards, Books and More: Other perks include items that will inspire you on your generosity journey.

 

Watch a short video of our founder sharing the vision behind Glow.

 

 

 

There are many ways you can help, even if you can't contribute.

  • Help us get the word out and make a noise about our campaign by using the Indiegogo share tools.
  • Like our page on Facebook

 

Lets put an end to the "ugh". That feeling you get when giving to charity and think your gift won't make much of a difference! Supercharge your impact by helping us launch Glow!

This will only happen during our Indiegogo campaign and never be repeated again. The charity must be a US 501c3 registered non-profit and cannot be a school or place of worship. (When the campaign ends we will send a charity nomination form).
2) In-App Level Upgrades: When using the app you will receive points for participating in Daily Glow activities, inviting friends, sharing stories on social and many different types of engagement. These points will level you up within the app that will unlock rewards like discounts on adventure travel and products by partner brands as well as other community-related perks.
3) Gift Cards, Books and More: Other perks include items that will inspire you on your generosity journey.
 


Watch a short video of our founder sharing the vision behind Glow.

 

 
 


There are many ways you can help, even if you can't contribute.

Help us get the word out and make a noise about our campaign by using the Indiegogo share tools.
Like our page on Facebook


 
Lets put an end to the "ugh". That feeling you get when giving to charity and think your gift won't make much of a difference! Supercharge your impact by helping us launch Glow!

story:
BRINGING MINDFUL MOMENTS TO BUSY LIVES

The Moment Pebble enables you to take 30 second micro moments of mindfulness – any time, anywhere. With a gentle light that beats from within, it guides you through short breathing exercises that help you de-stress and re-energise before you continue with your day.   

 KEY BENEFITS

 WHY IT WORKS

Unchecked, stress can build up during your day. But if you take moments to interrupt the “autopilot” state of your mind, you give yourself an opportunity to ‘reset’ and remove a large amount of stress from your day. 

 HOW TO USE THE PEBBLE: 

 JUST A MOMENT...

The benefits of mindfulness are well documented – but finding time in your busy day to practice mindfulness is challenging for most. We aim to change this with the Moment Pebble. 

Alex experienced first hand the cost of not taking a moment for himself. He went to great lengths to understand the psychology behind it and prevent others suffering the same experience. With the Moment Pebble we hope to ensure other people don’t get to the point he got to.

We’re on a mission to make mindfulness quick, easy and accessible for everyone – from complete mindfulness newbies, to experienced meditators. 

Please join the Moment Movement by showing your support and help us prove that it's OK, in fact it's beneficial, to take frequent mind breaks.  

 AS SEEN IN...

 "...perhaps it is the future." - Nick Ferrari, LBC 

"..such a simplistic & powerful idea." -  Paul & Deb, UK Health Radio  

 SWITCH OFF 

Unlike most other modern mindfulness aids, the Moment Pebble doesn't rely on an app. It's not connected to your phone, meaning you can stay in the moment – undisturbed by calls and messages.

TOP FEATURES

  • A physical dedicated reminder to give your mind valuable breaks 
  • An external focus point to get you out of your busy mind
  • Its 30 second light sequence guides you through a short calming breathing exercise
  • Not synced to your phone allowing you to stay focused and in the moment
  • Fits in your palm and is completely wireless so you can always carry it with you
  • Simple tactile controls (Up = on, down = off)

WHAT'S INCLUDED

When you buy the Moment Pebble you also receive: 

  • The Moment Pebble (of course!)
  • The wireless charging stone  
  • A Moment Book (30 curated moment scripts) 
  • You also gain access to the Moment Community, a curated group containing the Moment Pebble team, our Doctors and an increasing network of wellness experts, as well as all  other Moment Pebble owners. The intention for the community is to provide a place where people can share their experiences as well as find support. Within the community you will have access to exclusive content, events, and expert feedback on any questions you may have. 
  • And finally, you will also have access to specifically designed 'Getting to know your Pebble' support materials. This is to help to get you into the groove of taking short mindful moments throughout your day.

Expert opinion: Dr Gini Harrison 

Dr Gini Harrison, Psychologist & Senior Lecturer at The Open University explains the benefits of mindfulness and where the Moment Pebble fits in:  

 

MOMENT PEBBLE USER REVIEW: 

Hamish Grierson (CEO & Co-Founder Thriva)

Hamish took part in our 6 week field trial with 14 other Moment Pebblers. We caught up with him about his experience using the Moment Pebble – here's what he said: 

BENEFITS (EXPANDED):

  • Reduced anxiety
  • Reduced stress
  • Reduce likelihood of depression
  • Calms the body & the mind
  • Gains perspective
  • Re-energises
  • Enhances sleep
  • Boosts brain power
  • Increased productivity
  • Improved creativity
  • Improved long term health   

PRODUCT SPECS:

  • Low energy design, the Pebble only requires charging once a fortnight
  • The wireless charging stone (base), requires charging once every 1-2 months 
  • Pebble is 60g
  • 6cm x 4cm x 1.5cm
  • 30 moment scripts provided in a 'Moment Booklet' to help get you started
  • Unconnected to your phone, the biggest source of modern anxiety 

The Pebble in action:  

 

OUR STORY & THE MOMENT MOVEMENT:

Alex and Charlie explain their motivations behind creating the Moment Pebble. 

We (Alex and Charlie) met working at a fast paced digital agency in the early 2010’s. Discovering a shared appreciation of mindfulness, we recognised how giving our busy brains a mindful break created space for innovation and motivation. But despite all our best intentions, both of us would continually fall out of our mindfulness practice. Which led us to an idea...

What if we had a gentle prompt? Something physical that reminded us to take a break?  A little nudge to take a moment for ourselves?           

And so the Moment Pebble was born.

Our passion is developing products that help bring mindful moments to busy lives – making them accessible to everyone, everywhere. The Moment Pebble is the first step. 

Please join us on this mission!

SUPPORTED BY

PARTNERS

Something physical that reminded us to take a break?  A little nudge to take a moment for ourselves?           And so the Moment Pebble was born.Our passion is developing products that help bring mindful moments to busy lives – making them accessible to everyone, everywhere. The Moment Pebble is the first step. Please join us on this mission!SUPPORTED BYPARTNERS

story:
Get the game now at www.championsoftheshengha.com

 

Introducing Champions of the Shengha

 

Champions of the Shengha is the world’s first emotionally responsive game that adds a new dimension to gameplay by bringing the emotional state of players directly into the experience. Join the tournament and duel opponents from around the world for ownership of the Grand Shengha temple.


Play with body and mind

The BfB sensor measures players' emotional state by tracking changes in their heart rate and brings it directly into gameplay so they can cast spells and creatures onto the battlefield like a real spellcaster would - with a focused and powerful mind.

Combat stress and anxiety

Through regular play, users learn to regulate their emotions via techniques at the heart of mindfulness meditation and recommended by health organisations including the NHS, BUPA and the mental health organisation MIND. These skills equip players to always perform at their best - whether that’s in the exam room, on the sports pitch or in difficult social situations.

Great for gamers

A tournament like no other: Players must defeat opponents from around the world to claim the title of Champion - and the keys to the Shengha - to make their chosen tribe the world’s greatest magical force. Players can:

  • Collect cards and build a fearsome deck of unique spells, creatures, weapons and equipment.
  • Take their deck into battle with players from around the world.
  • Join one of the three tribes of magic, Fear, Fury or Joy, each with a unique play style.
  • Bring their cards to life using their ability to focus their will - measured by the BfB sensor.

Get the game now: www.championsoftheshengha.com

 

What do players do in Champions of the Shengha?

There’s so much going on this game that it’s hard to fit it onto a campaign page. We’ve tried to condense it down into a handy feature list for you.
 

Compete in Duels

Jump into the arena, pick up your cards and fight opponents from around the world. The core of Champions' is a tactical card battling game that's deep and fun.
 

Build Your Deck

With over 100 cards in the starter deck there's plenty of ways to win. Cast colourful Creatures onto the battlefield and equip them with powerful Weapons and Armour. Wield characterful Spells distinct to your tribe and build unique decks to be tested in the temple battlegrounds. Build decks around Joy, Fear or Fury cards - and add Neutral cards to fill out your battle deck.

 

Cast Spells

Spells are powerful cards that can inflict direct damage, heal your wounded, or inflict a host of different effects onto the battlefield. Raise the dead, conjure a dust storm or drive every Creature into a mad rage!

 

Summon Creatures

In the world of Champions’, Creatures are the physical manifestations of powerful emotional forces left unchecked. Powerful spellcasters can summon them outright themselves.

 

Forge Equipment

Use Weapons and Armour to change the way your creatures fight and respond to new challenges. There are some incredible magical weapons to collect with unique effects on the board that can change a battle completely. Give your enemies cursed weapons that break their abilities.

 

Choose Your Tribe

The three tribes of magic are brawling again. Which one do you belong to?

Joy champions are expert at using their opponent’s force against them. charm your opponent into laying down arms, or persuade them to never deal a killing blow with mercy. Convert enemy creatures to your cause and have them turn against their former master. A good joy champion will never take a hit at all.

 

Fear champions make their home where others fear to tread - befriending ghosts and gruesome monsters and learning to overcome their own weaknesses. Bring opposing creatures back from the dead as ghosts and send them to battle to terrify your enemies into inaction, or panic them into striking out in the wrong direction. A terrified enemy is a paralysed enemy.

 

Fury champions call on mighty warriors, complicated machines and animals of the wild to communicate their explosive anger. They often get carried away! Rush in, hit hard, and keep the momentum with enraged creatures that just keep going, and a powerful immunity to magic. Don’t give your opponent a chance to recover!


 

Support this game in schools

We are making the game available for free to our network of partner schools and youth groups in the UK and USA as part of this launch.

If you’re going to buy one, why not give one too? Or nominate a class or school to receive a pack of games.

 

BfB Labs

Champions of the Shengha was created by BfB Labs, a new social venture that sets out to bring Emotionally Responsive Gaming (ERG) to the world.

BfB Labs have spent the last two years researching, developing, designing and testing Champions of Shengha. It has been through three major rounds of prototype development and trialling, and undergone five impact trials.

BfB Labs were awarded seed funding from social tech funder The Nominet Trust and in 2014 were selected as a Google Impact Award finalist, receiving funding to develop the game.

The Team

We're a diverse bunch, passionate about making great games, new experiences for our players, and measurable changes to their wellbeing. Simon made his first game when he was 12 on an Amiga. Duncan understands how businesses work and makes sure ours does. Kathleen and Naomi ensure we're on a sound scientific footing. Adam keeps things looking gorgeous, and KJ actually does all the work (but don't tell him!)

 

FAQ

  • What platforms will Champions of the Shengha be available on?
    We'll be building the game for Android and iOS devices - phones and tablets. 
     
  • Have you already finished the game? 
    We've been building CotS for quite a while now, and hundreds of players have used the game, some for over a month. We've still got a fair way to go before it's ready for everyone to play though, and that's why we need your help. We're expecting to release in June 2017.
  • ​Will beta testers get the final version of the game?
    Beta testers will have access to all new versions of the game as they are released up to and including the final version, which will be ready by June 2017.
     
  • What's the BfB Sensor?
    The BfB Sensor is a pulse oximeter, a type of sensor which illuminates the skin and measures changes in the light returned. In doing this we measure the volume of blood moving through your body - and so your pulse. It is a bluetooth clip attached to your earlobe, with a small device clipped to your clothes.​
     
  • Do I need a BfB Sensor to play?
    We recommend playing with a BfB sensor, and the game must be played with some sort of heart rate monitor. If you have BTLE enabled chest strap like the Polar H7 you'll be able to use that. We can't guarantee a great experience with any sensor other than our own. 
     
  • How will I get new cards in Champions of the Shengha?
    You'll be able to earn new cards through playing. We will also sell booster packs of random cards in the app. Once we're up and running we'll be launching card sets throughout the year which offer new ways to play and interact. 
     
  • Are there physical cards?
    The game is played 100% digitally. If you buy the 'Choose your tribe' perk you'll get a limited edition run of 15 full colour printed cards belonging to the tribe of your choice, and a code to unlock those cards in the game. ​

Champions of the Shengha is the world’s first emotionally responsive game that adds a new dimension to gameplay by bringing the emotional state of players directly into the experience. Join the tournament and duel opponents from around the world for ownership of the Grand Shengha temple.

Play with body and mind
The BfB sensor measures players' emotional state by tracking changes in their heart rate and brings it directly into gameplay so they can cast spells and creatures onto the battlefield like a real spellcaster would - with a focused and powerful mind.Combat stress and anxietyThrough regular play, users learn to regulate their emotions via techniques at the heart of mindfulness meditation and recommended by health organisations including the NHS, BUPA and the mental health organisation MIND. These skills equip players to always perform at their best - whether that’s in the exam room, on the sports pitch or in difficult social situations.Great for gamersA tournament like no other: Players must defeat opponents from around the world to claim the title of Champion - and the keys to the Shengha - to make their chosen tribe the world’s greatest magical force. Players can:
Collect cards and build a fearsome deck of unique spells, creatures, weapons and equipment.
Take their deck into battle with players from around the world.
Join one of the three tribes of magic, Fear, Fury or Joy, each with a unique play style.
Bring their cards to life using their ability to focus their will - measured by the BfB sensor.
Get the game now: www.championsoftheshengha.com
 What do players do in Champions of the Shengha?There’s so much going on this game that it’s hard to fit it onto a campaign page. We’ve tried to condense it down into a handy feature list for you. Compete in DuelsJump into the arena, pick up your cards and fight opponents from around the world. The core of Champions' is a tactical card battling game that's deep and fun. Build Your DeckWith over 100 cards in the starter deck there's plenty of ways to win. Cast colourful Creatures onto the battlefield and equip them with powerful Weapons and Armour. Wield characterful Spells distinct to your tribe and build unique decks to be tested in the temple battlegrounds. Build decks around Joy, Fear or Fury cards - and add Neutral cards to fill out your battle deck. Cast SpellsSpells are powerful cards that can inflict direct damage, heal your wounded, or inflict a host of different effects onto the battlefield. Raise the dead, conjure a dust storm or drive every Creature into a mad rage! Summon CreaturesIn the world of Champions’, Creatures are the physical manifestations of powerful emotional forces left unchecked. Powerful spellcasters can summon them outright themselves. Forge EquipmentUse Weapons and Armour to change the way your creatures fight and respond to new challenges. There are some incredible magical weapons to collect with unique effects on the board that can change a battle completely. Give your enemies cursed weapons that break their abilities. Choose Your TribeThe three tribes of magic are brawling again. Which one do you belong to?Joy champions are expert at using their opponent’s force against them. charm your opponent into laying down arms, or persuade them to never deal a killing blow with mercy. Convert enemy creatures to your cause and have them turn against their former master. A good joy champion will never take a hit at all. Fear champions make their home where others fear to tread - befriending ghosts and gruesome monsters and learning to overcome their own weaknesses. Bring opposing creatures back from the dead as ghosts and send them to battle to terrify your enemies into inaction, or panic them into striking out in the wrong direction. A terrified enemy is a paralysed enemy. Fury champions call on mighty warriors, complicated machines and animals of the wild to communicate their explosive anger. They often get carried away! Rush in, hit hard, and keep the momentum with enraged creatures that just keep going, and a powerful immunity to magic. Don’t give your opponent a chance to recover!

 Support this game in schoolsWe are making the game available for free to our network of partner schools and youth groups in the UK and USA as part of this launch.If you’re going to buy one, why not give one too? Or nominate a class or school to receive a pack of games. BfB LabsChampions of the Shengha was created by BfB Labs, a new social venture that sets out to bring Emotionally Responsive Gaming (ERG) to the world.BfB Labs have spent the last two years researching, developing, designing and testing Champions of Shengha. It has been through three major rounds of prototype development and trialling, and undergone five impact trials.BfB Labs were awarded seed funding from social tech funder The Nominet Trust and in 2014 were selected as a Google Impact Award finalist, receiving funding to develop the game.The TeamWe're a diverse bunch, passionate about making great games, new experiences for our players, and measurable changes to their wellbeing. Simon made his first game when he was 12 on an Amiga. Duncan understands how businesses work and makes sure ours does. Kathleen and Naomi ensure we're on a sound scientific footing. Adam keeps things looking gorgeous, and KJ actually does all the work (but don't tell him!) 
FAQ

What platforms will Champions of the Shengha be available on?We'll be building the game for Android and iOS devices - phones and tablets.  
Have you already finished the game? We've been building CotS for quite a while now, and hundreds of players have used the game, some for over a month. We've still got a fair way to go before it's ready for everyone to play though, and that's why we need your help. We're expecting to release in June 2017.




​Will beta testers get the final version of the game?Beta testers will have access to all new versions of the game as they are released up to and including the final version, which will be ready by June 2017. 
What's the BfB Sensor?The BfB Sensor is a pulse oximeter, a type of sensor which illuminates the skin and measures changes in the light returned. In doing this we measure the volume of blood moving through your body - and so your pulse. It is a bluetooth clip attached to your earlobe, with a small device clipped to your clothes.​ 
Do I need a BfB Sensor to play?We recommend playing with a BfB sensor, and the game must be played with some sort of heart rate monitor. If you have BTLE enabled chest strap like the Polar H7 you'll be able to use that. We can't guarantee a great experience with any sensor other than our own.  
How will I get new cards in Champions of the Shengha?You'll be able to earn new cards through playing. We will also sell booster packs of random cards in the app. Once we're up and running we'll be launching card sets throughout the year which offer new ways to play and interact.  
Are there physical cards?The game is played 100% digitally. If you buy the 'Choose your tribe' perk you'll get a limited edition run of 15 full colour printed cards belonging to the tribe of your choice, and a code to unlock those cards in the game. ​

story:
For centuries, the beauty industry introduced women to beauty products that convinced them to cover up or alter their natural beauty.

 

Those targets were often women of color who have had a history of being under-represented, overlooked, and told that they were the least desired.  Historically many of such products have also proven to be hazardous to our health.

 

How is BASE BUTTER offering the solution?  

 

We believe that all women of color can be in control of their health and wellness once empowered to do so. By providing women of color with access to quality products developed by and for them, building a community of likeminded women of color to collaborate, access & share knowledge, and creating and living by our own standards of beauty the sky is the limit.

Data continues to show that often times women of color are underrepresented in the wellness market.Until the recent natural hair care movement women of color's visibility was extremely slim, but truth be told we are more than just our hair. We shop at farmers markets, we enjoy yoga, and we care about what we put on and in our bodies. BASE BUTTER bridges the gap between wellness and beauty by emphasizing that your natural beauty is true beauty and that it is skin deep. We protect your true beauty by formulating skincare products with ingredients that offer holistic benefits such as aromatherapy and energy healing and we source our raw ingredients responsibly ensuring that we abide by the cruelty free seal and fair trade imports. With BASE BUTTER, we are creating a wellness and beauty community for us by us.

Growing up I was continuously struggling with “bad” skin. From the time of my first acne breakout in middle school to adulthood I never really felt comfortable in my skin. I spent an embarrassing amount of money on “the best” systems and medical grade formulas to find out they not only worked temporarily but had major side effects that would leave me with highly sensitive skin, scars, discoloration, and hormonal changes that required even more care. I was seeing my dermatologist more than I did my primary care doctor! I refused to believe this would be my reality forever so I took control and started:

  1. Researching what I was putting in and on my body

  2. Discovering the beauty I was born with

Through self discovery and education three themes continued to pop up which eventually led me to develop BASE BUTTER.

After years of dealing with “bad” skin, severe asthma, and frequent burnouts due to my “workaholic” nature I started reading and researching ingredient labels and linking their side effects to my health experience. This new-found awareness allowed me to take control and action.

As I began to investigate the ingredients found in my good old petroleum jelly and baby powder I knew that there must be better options.   In my move to a more holistic lifestyle I found that my peers were beginning to embrace the same. We were discovering and learning from each other, our experiences were very similar.

It’s no secret that the beauty industry inaccurately depicts women of color. From a young age I recognized this, and for a time I aspired to be something or someone that I was not.

While building the BASE BUTTER brand and community I’ve had the benefit of a strong support system.  These women continue to motivate and push me to my full potential. I call them my tribe. Every young woman deserves a support system like this.  It is my belief that it would enable them to not only follow their dreams and passions, but to do it without hesitation. It is for this reason I co-founded a nonprofit with several members of my tribe called Her Success, Inc. where $1 from each BASE BUTTER sale will be donated to Her Success, Inc. starting August 2017.

In 2016 BASE BUTTER was featured in ESSENCE, NYLON, and Cosmopolitan magazine, trademarked, and in the hands of over 5,000 customers. I did this alone, and to be quite frank, I was not expecting this! But, demand has exceeded supply. My team has grown from a one woman show to a dynamic four-person team.

In order to produce on a grander scale and to truly position ourselves within the market there is a lot of work that needs to be done.

Are the beauty products on your shelf truly made with you in mind?

I am not just asking if the chemist in the labs are considering that your skin is the largest organ of your body, reading the research that proves up to 65% of what you put on your skin is absorbed into your body, and understand that our skin absorbs both nutrients and toxins. I am asking do they have YOU in mind.

Women of color have melanin-rich skin which is disproportionately disposed to excess oil, hyper-pigmentation, acne and eczema. And while women of color spend 80% more on beauty products, majority of the products we invest in aren’t made for our melanin rich skin.That is why BASE BUTTER thinks of the women first and our products second.

For Us, By Us, & Good For You 

Overcoming Our Risks & Challenges 

Manufacturing: Manufacturers require us to purchase a large bulk quantity of each item which significantly increases the upfront investment. For many small businesses like ours, this can be one major hurdle which prevents us from competing with the big brands.

Saturated market: The beauty industry is a saturated market. Since the law does not require cosmetic labeling to have FDA approval before cosmetic products go on the market and the FDA does not have a list of approved or accepted claims for cosmetics it has easy barriers to entry. Although regulations are loose and competition high, BASE BUTTER stays true by honoring a commitment to quality. We consciously source our ingredients and with your help will be able to gain quality assurance certifications.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute financially, you can still make a big difference and here's how:

CONNECT WITH US! Click on the icons to the top right of your screen and find us on Facebook and Twitter, and swing by our website to learn more. Also, find us on Instagram @basebutter

SHARE THIS CAMPAIGN! If you can't support us financially, there are other ways to support! Sharing us on your social media and telling your friends is also a huge help! We appreciate everyone's support and dedication. Please tag us/use our hashtag if you post on social media so we can send some love: @basebutter

Shipping For International Backers:

First off, thank you so much for your support! We want nothing more than to get you your fantastic rewards as soon as possible. Although we will cover most of the cost of shipping to you, we do ask that you add $10 to any reward you choose for shipping.  Shipping is one of our biggest challenges so we appreciate you allowing us to take the time, effort and material needed to ensure your BASE BUTTER treats make it to you safe and sound! ENJOY!!

story:
Short Summary

Two million refugee infants are dying annually due to causes such as malaria, pneumonia, and malnutrition. These are deaths that can be solved by a simple solution: mother’s milk. We are the world’s first globally commercialized breast milk donation service. We offer preventative health care to eliminate refugee infant mortality through accessible and affordable breast-milk. We reduce infant mortality rates and empower mothers and families by reducing their weekly food-cost expenses.

We are Milky Way and we leverage one of the most powerful relationships in the world - that of a mother and her child. We are the world’s first commercial breast milk service. We offer affordable and accessible breast-milk to eliminate infant mortality and empower families.

 

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

> Packaging

>Transportation

>Setting up pasteurization infrastructure

 

  • Once we are able to set up our first milk bank through the help of our strategic NGO partners, we will begin on boarding donors. All funding (even if the goal isn't reached) towards setting up our pilot milk banks in London, Ontario. 

 

The Impact

Through your donation, Milky Way is able to create meaningful gains for society by reducing childhood mortality rates. Families can now save anywhere between 50-75% on food costs for their infants and children in marginalized communities can now grow up to contribute upwards of $1.8B to their local economies. Milky Way aims to bridge the gaps between all members of society by providing the right nutritional tools for a healthy and equitable future. 

Risks & Challenges

There are socio-cultural considerations that are resulting from the adoption of such a progressive business model into mainstream society. Milky Way is currently working to raise awareness about the breast milk donation movement and getting mainstream society and media attention in regards to this phenomena. Awareness leads to adoption and the more people know about what Milky Way is trying to do, we project that the more people will want to get involved. Additionally, performing in a B2B framework will mean that Milky Way’s financial success in terms of sales growth and profitability will be entirely contingent on partner NGOs receiving sponsorships, donations and funding. To combat this issue, Milky Way instituted a subscription model wherein the cost is spread over a certain period of time to ensure that NGOs don’t become financially overextended.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

For more opportunities on how to get involved, please like our Facebook page to keep updated with our campaigns and our progress! We appreciate every like and share as it goes towards creating awareness on not only the breast milk donation movement but how everyone can do their part in creating a healthier future for the world's most underserved people.

story:
Version Française >>>

Qi Gong is an easy and accessible way to :
- Exercise your body
- Improve your health and longevity
- Remove your toxins
- Reduce your stress
- Improve your blood and energy circulation
- Balance Yin and Yang, Fire and Water energies, mind and body

Hi, my name is Rafael. I'm a Frenchman and spend six months a year in Thailand, where I teach Qi Gong. 
I have 15 years of experience and interest in Buddhism and Eastern philosophy, Qi Gong, Tai Chi Chuan, Taoism, theology, buddhist and taoist meditation, and self-healing practices.
My previous training includes Tai Chi Chuan, Hatha Yoga, Qi Gong, Buddhist Teachings, Buddhist Meditation and Reiki.

The goal of this campaign is to produce an easy to learn Qi Gong method so that you can practise on your own in your everyday life. Based on the Qi Gong course I have been teaching for the last six years, the method includes some warm-up and breathing exercises, standing practice (exercises in movement) as well as sitting practice (meditation).
The "Qi Gong Essential Daily Practice Set" will feature an easy to follow video with several selectable soundtracks: voiceover with instructions in English or French (for beginners),or music and sounds of nature (for advanced students). The video will be recorded in High Definition.
The 24 page booklet will also give you clearly written instructions, featuring details about qi gong postures,  principles to be followed, as well as several sitting meditations. 

You will thus have all you need for your daily or weekly practice.

By clicking here you can visit my site to get more info about Qi Gong.

The funds raised through this campaign will be used to pay for:

- Production of the video.

- Pressing costs of the dvd.

- Printing costs for the booklet and the dvd cover.

- Proof reading of the English translation of both the booklet and the video texts by a native English speaker and professional translator.

- Recording the video voiceover by a native English speaker.

Any remaining money (if any) will be used to add more exercises and to improve the layout and design of the booklet and the dvd cover.

There are two ways you can help:

- you can select one of our perks (at the top of this page on the right).

Any contribution, even the smallest, will help to bring this project to life.
You can also, if you wish, add an extra amount of money to the perk selected.

 - and/or you can spread the word about this project.  

Please share the link to this campaign on your social media platforms, on your website, blog or by email, by using the Share tools under the video at the top of this page.

 

Here is the list of Perks you can choose from. 

 - FREE SHIPPING WORLDWIDE for all printed materials -

Credit

Your name will appear in the end credits of the video as a donor (~£6.5).

 

 

 

Double Credit

Your name will appear in the end credits of the video and in the booklet as a donor (~£10).

 

 

 

Digital Version

You will receive a link to download the video and its booklet. Then you can watch/read them as many times as you want on your computer, tv, tablet or smart phone. + Double Credit perk.(~£23.80)

 

 

 

Printed Version

You will receive by mail the video on a DVD and its booklet. + Double Credit perk. Free shipping Worldwide. (~£36.45)

 

 

 

Printed + Digital

All in one. Digital Version + Printed Version + Double Credit perks. Free shipping worldwide. (~£46.40)

 

 

 

Live + Printed + Digital

Come and meet me in Koh Chang, Thailand for a 3 Day Course (from May till December, valid for 1 or 2 people). + Digital Version + Printed Version + Double Credit perks.(~£167)

 

 

License for Teacher

You acquire the right to teach the method in your qi gong, tai chi, meditation or yoga school. + Digital Version + Printed Version + Double Credit perks. (~£502)

 

 

Business Angel

This will sure help a lot. Your name will appear in the end credits of the video and in the booklet as Producer. + UNLIMITED downloads of the Digital Version + 10 Printed Version perks. (~£670)

 

What are Stretch Goals?

They are freebies you will get if we surpass our goal.

At $6000, I will add two Gi Gong meditations to the sitting practice section of the booklet. Anybody having contributed to a "Digital Version" perk or higher levels will get them for free.

At $8000, will add two guided meditations audio files to download. Anybody having contributed to a "Digital Version" perk or higher levels will get them for free.

At $10000, I will add two exercises, showing how to work with sounds, to the sitting practice section of the booklet. Anybody having contributed to a "Digital Version" perk or higher levels will get them for free.

More Stretch Goals will be added over the campaign.

 

Thank you for reading and I hope that, together, we can bring this project to life.

 

Version Française

Veuillez cliquer ici pour voir la vidéo d'introduction en français.

Le Qi Gong (prononcer "Tchi Gong") est un moyen facile et accessible:
- d'exercer votre corps
- d'améliorer votre santé et votre longévité
- d'évacuer vos toxines
- de réduire votre stress
- d'améliorer votre circulation sanguine et énergétique
- de rétablir la balance entre votre Yin et votre Yang, entre les énergies de Feu et d'Eau, et entre votre esprit et votre corps.

Bonjour, mon nom est Rafael. Je suis Français et je passe six mois par an en Thaïlande, où j'enseigne le Qi Gong.
J'ai 15 ans d’expérience et d’intérêt en bouddhisme et philosophie orientale, incluant Qi Gong, Tai Chi Chuan, taoïsme, théologie, méditation bouddhique et taoïste, et médecine naturelle.
Ma formation comprend du Tai Chi Chuan, du Hatha Yoga, du Qi Gong, des enseignements bouddhiques, de la méditation bouddhique et du Reiki.

Le but de cette campagne est de produire une méthode de Qi Gong facile à apprendre pour vous permettre de pratiquer seul(e) dans votre vie quotidienne. Basée sur le stage de Qi Gong que j'enseigne depuis six ans, la méthose comprend des exercices de respiration et d'échauffement, des exercices de mouvement en postion debout, ainsi que des exercices à pratiquer en position assise (méditation).
Cette «Méthode Élémentaire pour la pratique du Qi Gong» se présentera sous le forme d'une vidéo, avec un choix de plusieurs bandes sonores: voix off avec des instructions en anglais ou en français (pour les débutants), ou musique et sons de la nature (pour les étudiants avancés). La vidéo sera tounée en Haute Définition.
Le livret de 24 pages l'accompagnant vous donnera également des instructions claires, avec des détails comme les positions à adopter, les principes à suivre, ainsi que plusieurs méditations assises.

En fait, vous aurez tout ce dont vous avez besoin pour votre pratique quotidienne ou hebdomadaire.

En cliquant ici, vous pouvez visiter mon site pour en savoir plus sur le Qi Gong.

Les fonds récoltés grâce à cette campagne serviront à payer :

- La production de la vidéo.

- Les frais de pressage du DVD.

- Les frais d'impression du livret et de la jaquette du DVD.

- La vérification et la correction de la traduction anglaise par un traducteur professionnel.

- L'enregistrement de la voix off de la version anglaise de la vidéo par un natif anglais.

Toute somme restante (s'il en reste) sera utilisée pour ajouter des exercices supplémentaires et pour améliorer la présentation du livret et de la jaquette du DVD.

Il y a deux façons dont vous pouvez aider:

- vous pouvez sélectionner l'un de nos forfaits (aussi appelés contreparties) en haut de cette page à droite.

Toute contribution, même la plus petite, aidera à donner vie à ce projet. Vous pouvez également, si vous le souhaitez, ajouter une somme supplémentaire (du montant que vous voulez) au forfait choisi.

 -  et/ou vous pouvez parler de ce projet autour de vous. 

Partagez s'il vous plaît le lien de cette campagne sur les réseaux sociaux, sur votre site, votre blog ou par e-mail, en utilisant les outils de partage placés sous la vidéo en haut de cette page.

 

Voici la liste des Contreparties parmi lesquelles vous pouvez choisir. 

- FRAIS DE PORT GRATUITS dans le monde entier pour tous les objects physiques -

Credit

Votre nom apparaîtra au générique de fin de la vidéo en tant que donateur. (~7.5€)

 

 

Double Credit

Votre nom apparaîtra au générique de fin de la vidéo et dans le livret en tant que donateur. (~11.5€)

 

 

  

Digital Version

Printed Version

Printed + Digital

 Le "Tout en Un". Contreparties "Digital version" +"Printed Version" + "Double Credit".(~53.85€)

 

 

 

Live + Printed + Digital

Venez me rencontrer à Koh Chang, Thaïlande pour un stage de 3 jours (de Mai à Décembre, valable pour 1 ou 2 personnes). + Contreparties "Digital version" + "Printed Version" + "Double Credit".(~192€)

 

 

License for Teacher

Business Angel

Voici quelques bonus que vous obtiendrez si nous dépassons notre objectif:

À 6000 $ j'ajouterai deux méditations de Qi Gong à la section Pratique Assise du livret.Toute personne ayant contribué à une Contrepartie "Digital Version" et au dessus les obtiendra gratuitement.

À 8000 $, j'ajouterai deux fichiers audio de méditations guidées à télécharger. Toute personne ayant contribué à une Contrepartie "Digital Version" et au dessus les obtiendra gratuitement.

À 10000 $, j'ajouterai deux exercices, montrant comment travailler avec des sons, à la section Pratique Assise du livret. Toute personne ayant contribué à une Contrepartie "Digital Version" et au dessus les obtiendra gratuitement.
