story:
We need YOUR HELP to fund the launch of our first product line: CollinsCare Opioid Recovery Nutrition - this first product line consists of three components that have been designed to work in unison to help replenish key nutrients required for the brain and body to repair the specific types of damage caused by opioid use - 1 ) Opioid Recovery Nutrition Shake, 2) Opioid Recovery Vitamins and Minerals, and 3) Opioid Recovery Essential Oils, Healthy Fats, and Probiotics. Promoting healthy brain chemistry, providing specific ingredients needed by the body to repair damaged organs, addressing mood-management, and helping re-establish normal sleep patterns are just a few of the priorities that CollinsCare Opioid Recovery Nutrition focuses on.

Although our first product launch is for Opioid Recovery - Our patent-pending, three-part delivery system allowed us to develop recovery products to help people who wish to repair their bodies from damages caused by prolonged drug use of all types; we have worked closely with the most respected professional dieticians, nutritionists, addiction psychiatrists, neurologists, and physicians to design additional, unique nutrition recovery formulas for each of the following:  Alcohol, Cocaine, and Amphetamines. Although nutrition has been scientifically proven to be a determining factor in the success of rehabilitation programs, CollinsCare is the first company to use these scientific discoveries to combine all the necessary ingredients into easy-to-use nutritional supplement regiments, each being uniquely designed for addressing damages caused by specific drugs.

There's no quick, painless shortcut through detox or recovery. The truth of the matter is - a full recovery takes time! By supplementing your body with specific vitamins, minerals, amino acids, essential oils and fats, proteins, and probiotics - users are able to give their anatomy the nutritional ammunition required to ensure the most efficient and most thorough recovery possible.

 

YOUR DONATIONS will fund the professional manufacturing of our first product line, CollinsCare Opioid Recovery Nutrition, as soon as possible so that we can get these recovery supplements to those who need them most!

 

If You Can't Donate, Help Us By Sharing Our Campaign! 

​

 

 

How does Opioid Nutrition Recovery help?

 

     #1   Opioid Recovery Nutrition Shake

 

     #2   Opioid Recovery Vitamins & Minerals

 

    #3   Opioid Recovery Probiotics & Essential Oils

 

 

 

 

Frequently Asked Questions

 

 

Please take a moment to share if you know someone who could benefit from this new product!

 

 

 

Our Timeline

 

 

 

 

 

We’re also excited to announce CollinsCare Community, our new charity that will help provide financial support and encouragement to addicts who've decided to enter an addiction recovery program. Making that decision takes a lot of courage, even with the help and support of family and friends. Unfortunately, many addicts aren't able to attend rehab programs because of financial difficulties or lack of insurance. The thought of taking on even more debt often prevents people from following through and getting the help they need. 

According to recent statistics, 1 out of every 12 adults in the United States suffers with a substance addiction but sadly, slightly less than 11% actually seek treatment.

 

 

To help provide financial support to addicts and their families while they're away from home attending in-patient recovery programs, CollinsCare is dedicating a portion of sales receipts to help fund CollinsCare Community. 

Donations and a percentage of our product sales will help pay for some of the most essential household and family expenses while addicts undergo treatment - things like child care, groceries, phone bills, utilities, health insurance, rent or mortgage payments, and even pet care!  We're hoping this will help families worry less about finances and focus more on supporting their loved one in recovery.
story_txt:
We need YOUR HELP to fund the launch of our first product line: CollinsCare Opioid Recovery Nutrition - this first product line consists of three components that have been designed to work in unison to help replenish key nutrients required for the brain and body to repair the specific types of damage caused by opioid use - 1 ) Opioid Recovery Nutrition Shake, 2) Opioid Recovery Vitamins and Minerals, and 3) Opioid Recovery Essential Oils, Healthy Fats, and Probiotics. Promoting healthy brain chemistry, providing specific ingredients needed by the body to repair damaged organs, addressing mood-management, and helping re-establish normal sleep patterns are just a few of the priorities that CollinsCare Opioid Recovery Nutrition focuses on.Although our first product launch is for Opioid Recovery - Our patent-pending, three-part delivery system allowed us to develop recovery products to help people who wish to repair their bodies from damages caused by prolonged drug use of all types; we have worked closely with the most respected professional dieticians, nutritionists, addiction psychiatrists, neurologists, and physicians to design additional, unique nutrition recovery formulas for each of the following:  Alcohol, Cocaine, and Amphetamines. Although nutrition has been scientifically proven to be a determining factor in the success of rehabilitation programs, CollinsCare is the first company to use these scientific discoveries to combine all the necessary ingredients into easy-to-use nutritional supplement regiments, each being uniquely designed for addressing damages caused by specific drugs.There's no quick, painless shortcut through detox or recovery. The truth of the matter is - a full recovery takes time! By supplementing your body with specific vitamins, minerals, amino acids, essential oils and fats, proteins, and probiotics - users are able to give their anatomy the nutritional ammunition required to ensure the most efficient and most thorough recovery possible. YOUR DONATIONS will fund the professional manufacturing of our first product line, CollinsCare Opioid Recovery Nutrition, as soon as possible so that we can get these recovery supplements to those who need them most! If You Can't Donate, Help Us By Sharing Our Campaign! ​  How does Opioid Nutrition Recovery help?      #1   Opioid Recovery Nutrition Shake      #2   Opioid Recovery Vitamins & Minerals 
    #3   Opioid Recovery Probiotics & Essential Oils
    Frequently Asked Questions  Please take a moment to share if you know someone who could benefit from this new product!   Our Timeline     We’re also excited to announce CollinsCare Community, our new charity that will help provide financial support and encouragement to addicts who've decided to enter an addiction recovery program. Making that decision takes a lot of courage, even with the help and support of family and friends. Unfortunately, many addicts aren't able to attend rehab programs because of financial difficulties or lack of insurance. The thought of taking on even more debt often prevents people from following through and getting the help they need. According to recent statistics, 1 out of every 12 adults in the United States suffers with a substance addiction but sadly, slightly less than 11% actually seek treatment.  To help provide financial support to addicts and their families while they're away from home attending in-patient recovery programs, CollinsCare is dedicating a portion of sales receipts to help fund CollinsCare Community. Donations and a percentage of our product sales will help pay for some of the most essential household and family expenses while addicts undergo treatment - things like child care, groceries, phone bills, utilities, health insurance, rent or mortgage payments, and even pet care!  We're hoping this will help families worry less about finances and focus more on supporting their loved one in recovery.

story:
Who We Are 

We are five students from the University of Tennessee working directly with the nonprofit organization Project Healing Waters to raise money for Project Healing Waters in order to aid in the rehabilitation of veterans with disabilities.

Project Healing Waters is a 501(c)3 nonprofit organization that seeks to assist veterans with disabilities during their time of rehabilitation by educating them on how to fly-fish in the backcountry of the Smoky Mountains. The organization was founded in 2005 with the aid of wounded military personnel returning home from Iraq and Afghanistan.

Not only does the organization provide rudimentary fly-fishing lessons, it also incorporates fly-tying and rod-building classes. These classes meet the experience levels of both novice and experienced participants and are completely free of cost to the veterans. It is Project Healing Waters’ dedication to providing long-term, ongoing classes that identify as opportunities for socialization and education that makes it unique and beneficial to its members. 

Healing those who serve one fishing trip at a time. 

The Purpose of Our Campaign

During this campaign, we are working to raise $2000 for Project Healing Waters of Knoxville, Tennessee. These donations will go towards acquiring fishing supplies including additional fly rods and fly-tying material. This money will allow Project Healing Waters to purchase five new rods as well as other necessary equipment. 

Volunteers and veterans working together in fly-tying and rod-building classes. 

Perks 

We thank everyone for their support and generous donations that vary from $10 or more. All contributions are appreciated and positively impact our efforts in the rehabilitation of veterans with disabilities.

For a donation of $10, all will receive a personal shout-out on Project Healing Water’s Facebook page. This shout-out is a great way for individuals and businesses to show their support for veterans in the Knoxville area. While for a donation of $20, you will receive a sticker from popular recreational outfitters such as Black Rifle Coffee, Three Rivers Angler, and Orvis. Finally, for a donation of $200 you can claim your very own Fly-Fishing Rod that would be great to take with you on a fishing trip. 

These veterans are hooked on Project Healing Waters.

How It Will Impact the Community 

The impact the fundraising will have on the public starts with building a strong network among the community and local veterans. These experiences allow for the veterans and the public to build relationships between one another and impact the community in a positive way. When the veterans venture into the Great Smoky Mountains, they are able to share their stories and hopefully find a connection along the way. PTSD is a growing problem in many veteran’s due to their service and these fishing trips allow them to relax while fishing in the flowing rivers of East Tennessee. Chad Rogers is an active member of Project Healing Waters and he stated that, “Veterans are known for having bad knees so being in the water is one the best kinds of therapy.”

Other Ways to Help

If you can’t donate today, a great way to help and support is by sharing our page through social media. Another way you can help this organization is by attending fishing trips as a volunteer at Project Healing Waters. To acquire further information on how to do so visit Project Healing Waters website to learn more about those opportunities, programs you can attend, and how to become more involved in the rehabilitation services. We are thankful for your generosity and determination for this organization!

 

 

All photos and footage of veterans are courtesy of Project Healing Waters.

story:
About Us:

We are 7th and 8th-grade students raising money for our class field trips this spring; excursions to the Tucson Ropes Course and the University of Arizona Sky School. In the latter field trip, students will travel up Mt. Lemmon to learn about astronomy and environmental science at the Sky School there. To fund these trip every year we practice engaging directly with our economy in our maker immersion week, where we create products to sell. Everyone who supports this campaign directly assists our fundraising for excusions such as the Ropes Course or the UA Sky School.

Our Trip:

UA Sky School provides science-based education programs. Stationed atop one of the unique sky islands of the southwest, this special learning center helps us to gain a better understanding of our environment. Students are taught programs which focus on environmental sciences, astronomy, and others, and are led by graduate students. We stay at the location over a series of days, and sleep in dorms with food provided for us. Sky School is a special experience which helps us to use our knowledge of the environment firsthand.

Our products:

To fundraise we are selling handmade beauty and wellness products made from freshly picked ingredients found locally. These include; healing salves made from creosote, creosote bundles to be burned, floral-pressed coasters, and jewelry (earrings, necklaces) with desert plants encased inside. All of the money goes toward our trips!

story:
New Within Us App Connects People via the Exchange of Positivity

Within Us App, a new social media platform is set to launch in App Store January 2018. According to founder Ron Cardillo, the app will bring humanity together via the exchange of positive and beautiful messages.

"The Within Us App allows people to be the hero in someone else's story," says Ron Cardillo, Founder. Along with developers, he designed the messaging service specifically for people to comfort and connect with each other in times of hardship. Users can share experiences and words of encouragement with total anonymity and privacy, an amenity not afforded by typical applications. According to Cardillo, the new service will fill this void in the social media-scape.

 

Why we are raising money

We need to raise the $50,000 for 3 specific reasons:

  1. We need additional money to finish the iPhone version that will be available for Beta Testing this month, and launching in the App Store January 2018.
  2. To advertise and promote awareness for the app so we can help as many people as possible as soon as possible.
  3. To begin development on the Android & Desktop versions of the app.

Helping others through the power of hope.

When people are feeling lost, hopeless, or in despair, they will be able to turn to Within Us app for help. There, they can listen to and take solace in stories from others who have been in similar situations and prevailed. It is a discrete way for people to support, motivate, and inspire each other in an authentic and altruistic way. The ultimate goal behind the app is to help people feel less alone, especially in times of crisis. To complement the experience of sharing beautiful messages, the messaging platform comes complete with an enchanting interactive display.

Be one of the first to use the Within Us app

The application will be ready for download for iPhone users from the App Store January 2018. If you would like to take part in Beta testing and become among the first to experience the app in mid-November, those interested should email the company at info@withinusapp.com or visit http://www.withinusapp.com/beta-sign-up to sign up. Space is limited to only 1500 and available on a first-come-first-served basis.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you believe in what we are doing and can't contribute, you can help in another way:

  • Spread the word out and make some noise about the Within Us app and our campaign.
  • Please use the sharing tools in Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Given the best tools and the right encouragement people can be exactly who they want to be, this workbook is designed to help them get there.

This workbook is the culmination of many years of helping people to create the change they want to see in their own lives, to embrace their personal autonomy and fulfill their own potential, something I have worked with people on since 2004, in small learning groups and 1-2-1 coaching and, latterly in my private clinic work, in face to face workshops and, for the past 3 years, via online Zoom activities.

My careers centred around managing change and supporting people to negotiate change as effectively and efficiently as possible, certain in the knowledge that self directed change is always more sustainable than change that feels forced or controlled by someone else.

My studies into people both physiologically and psychologically has given me amazing insights into how our brains work, so this workbook actively stimulates the right brain, our creative centre, and places creativity at the centre of the changes you  make as you work through the book, it’s a beautiful fusion of practicality, creativity and dynamic growth.

I’m Claire and the bundle of fluffy goodness I’m cuddling is my dog pTerry.   I have been a kinesiology practitioner for 15 years and was blown away by the versatility and relevance of the Chinese five element theory, studying it alongside my work as a change management coach and a psychology studies.

I have spent the last 16 months creating this book, getting down the ideas and carefully crafting useful insights, practical activities and gently probing questions.  Through conversations with illustrators, anatomical people, technical editors and user testers it is now ready to have the final illustrations drawn and to be printed and bound.  

Your contribution as part of our crowd funding community will make this possible by funding the final steps of this journey and get the book out into the world.  

Since I have created this book  in my own time, your contributions will pay for the final illustrations and print, there will also be a website upgrade to allow people access to new tools and ideas and some videos to add another dimension to the power of the activities in the book.

When I sat down to work out what else was needed and costing it out I was surprised and delighted to find that your contribution will make a significant impact in making this project a physical reality in a very short space of time and we don’t need to raise a huge amount to make that happen.

Here’s a chart showing the breakdown of what your valuable contribution will support

The most substantial costs cover Illustrations, printing and marketing/promotional activities, which makes sense for a book in the final stages of production.  

Some website development work is required to support downloads, and a shop where people can buy the workbook ongoing.  

I’m working with a lovely graphic designer who is taking on some design concepts for the cover and some of the other lovely bundle goodies so she gets a slice of the pie too.

I am ever grateful to John Thie and his Touch for Health Synthesis for the impact it has had on my life and, by way of thanks I have elected to donate £1, from every book sold through this crowd funding campaign, to the UK Touch for Health Charity, which endeavours to support those who wish to share or learn TFH and are unable to do so due to financial constraints.  They provide training bursaries and support outreach activities to share the magic of Touch for health with as many people as possible. More can be found out about their work at .https://www.touchforhealthcharity.com/about

I’ve had  fun creating some lovely perks for the wonderful people who support the crowd funding and I’ve gathered them together into bundles so you can choose how you want to treat yourself.  I hope you like them too.

The annual pass to the monthly workshops is a real bonus.  Many of the workshop attendees have remarked how powerful they find these online workshops,  helping them to stay on track and gain clearer insights into how they respond to change through the year.  This workbook was devised to work along the same pathway and can be used in conjunction with the online gatherings or on its own, either way you maintain the impetus to move forward with the momentum of change and enhance the outcomes of all your efforts.

Some of the bundles contain signed workbooks, with a personal message from me as a token of my appreciation of your faith in me and to remind you that I believe in you too, I know that, given the best tools and resources, you can make the changes you want.  

The postcards are little gems to prompt you as you progress through the workbook, maybe frame them or put them somewhere to remind you of useful insights on each stage of your journey, use them to reflect how far you’ve come and acknowledge the progress you are making, great for a daily reminder if you hit a sticking point or feel overwhelm creeping back in. 

The poster gives you clarity on the bigger picture too, prompting you to reflect on what’s most important for the stage you're at and it’s a useful size you can put up somewhere to refer to, without feeling you’ve redecorated the whole room.

The Impact

The work book adds another dimension to the work I’ve been delivering over the past three years, working face to face on a 1-2-1 basis and, even with small groups means I am organically spreading the word but, for some people it can feel daunting or it just may not be a possibility for various reasons.  

I created this workbook to allow many more people to access and use these self development tools in a supportive, creative way that will enable them to create the change they desire at a pace that works for them, offering a chink of light and, hopefully, opening a door through which they can grow the resilience to pursue the life they desire.

Books are a safe entry point for people as they try to get on a different path, they are safe spaces that the reader can choose to inhabit and engage with as/when they wish.  

Reaching a cross-roads in life can be overwhelming, it’s easy to get inundated with well meaning advice from those around us and giving ourselves permission to embrace something when we are ready, is extremely empowering.  This simple act of personal choice can be a catalyst for substantial change, especially when taken one step at a time, or in this case, one page at a time.

Your treasured contribution opens the door for this resource to be printed, purchased and gifted to anyone who would like a helping hand with change and has no idea where to start.  That’s a huge impact so, from all of those who don’t even know about this workbook yet, I’m sending you their thanks too, because of you their change will happen and their situation will improve.

The donations to the Touch for Health UK charity will help them spread the word about positive and profound techniques lay people can use to help them feel better both inside and out, another fabulous impact of your involvement in this simple project, Thank you from them too.

I have a team of people who have and are supporting me, many of whom are based local to me here in Yorkshire, so, your valuable contribution assists small businesses to flourish too, which certainly gives me a lovely warm feeling, I hope it does for you too.  

Here’s a bit about each of them:

Claire Cutler-Casey - Creator and Author: Coming from a background of change management, from changing huge antiquated organisations into modern, efficient powerhouses to supporting individuals to change their behaviours and radically empower their own lives, my passion is self-directed change that sticks. Read more about my career and the impact of that here https://www.linkedin.com/in/claire-cutler-casey...

pTerry - fluffy personal assistant:  my 4 year old maltichon, who sleeps under my desk and nudges me decisively when it’s time to take a break from screens and get some fresh air.  pTerry is named after Sir Terry Pratchett, one of my favourite authors and embodies ‘being more Terry’ with his chilled demeanour, fluffy kindness and simple love of life and everyone in it.

Caroline Mott - Technical editor and proof reader: Caroline is so knowledgeable, it is terrifying.  Caroline’s proof reading skills, patience and incredible sense of humour have added so much to the creation and realisation of this project, beautifully encapsulated by this comment  “Claire, are we using full stops or not? Pick a team my love, at the moment it’s all a bit, shall we say, random.”

Lucy Monkman - Illustrator: I’ve chosen this talented local illustrator to create some beautiful, inspiring content for you to colour.  I love Lucy’s fresh and joyful illustrations and am very excited to be working with her, find out more about Lucy and her work here https://lucymonkman.com/

Annina Diston - Graphic Design: Annina brings her unique, exquisite style and attention to detail to the project, find out more about her at her website https://anninadiston.com/

Printing and creative print production - Exactis Interactive Print:  all the associated excitement of creative print production is in the capable hands of Lucy and the team at Exactis  https://www.exactis.co.uk/ a wonderful bunch of people whose enthusiasm and ‘can do’ attitude has helped me make it to this point.

George Tyson has provided anatomical illustrations.

Beta testing & usability:  In order to ensure that the ideas and exercises contained in the book are practical and effective, I enlisted the help of a team of volunteer beta testes whose feedback has been extremely valuable, enabling me to ensure that the finished product is accessible and supportive, providing a completely stand alone resource that can be utilised by anyone who is interested to find out more about themselves and ready to make positive changes to enhance their own lives.  There are too many to mention individually here but they are all acknowledged in the book itself for their altruistic contribution to the project.

Risks & Challenges

I’ve done my assessment and and much of the risk has been minimised.

I’ve regularly kept in touch with my team along the way and continue to liaise with them.  They are ready to roll when their input is required.  

I’ve explored quite a few ‘what if’ scenarios and they mostly impact not enough sales, fortunately, this project does not need much capital to get the last bits done so, if we come in under target we just print less copies.  If we get loads of support and huge numbers of orders to fulfill I have contingencies in place to help with this. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Wow, thank you for reading this far, I really appreciate it.

I totally understand that for some of you reading this making any financial contribution right now may just not be possible and that’s cool, feeling your supportive vibe is adding an extra grease to my wheels.  

Contributions aren’t always about money though so, if you’d like to support what I’m doing in some other way please spread the word and let other people know about this campaign, either share this to your own contacts, direct people to my website of use some of Indiegogo’s great sharing tools. 

Whatever you do to get the word out, thank you, you have helped me to get my dream out of my head and into the world and I appreciate that.

Books are a safe entry point for people as they try to get on a different path, they are safe spaces that the reader can choose to inhabit and engage with as/when they wish.  
Reaching a cross-roads in life can be overwhelming, it’s easy to get inundated with well meaning advice from those around us and giving ourselves permission to embrace something when we are ready, is extremely empowering.  This simple act of personal choice can be a catalyst for substantial change, especially when taken one step at a time, or in this case, one page at a time.
Your treasured contribution opens the door for this resource to be printed, purchased and gifted to anyone who would like a helping hand with change and has no idea where to start.  That’s a huge impact so, from all of those who don’t even know about this workbook yet, I’m sending you their thanks too, because of you their change will happen and their situation will improve.
The donations to the Touch for Health UK charity will help them spread the word about positive and profound techniques lay people can use to help them feel better both inside and out, another fabulous impact of your involvement in this simple project, Thank you from them too.
I have a team of people who have and are supporting me, many of whom are based local to me here in Yorkshire, so, your valuable contribution assists small businesses to flourish too, which certainly gives me a lovely warm feeling, I hope it does for you too.  
Here’s a bit about each of them:

Claire Cutler-Casey - Creator and Author: Coming from a background of change management, from changing huge antiquated organisations into modern, efficient powerhouses to supporting individuals to change their behaviours and radically empower their own lives, my passion is self-directed change that sticks. Read more about my career and the impact of that here https://www.linkedin.com/in/claire-cutler-casey...

pTerry - fluffy personal assistant:  my 4 year old maltichon, who sleeps under my desk and nudges me decisively when it’s time to take a break from screens and get some fresh air.  pTerry is named after Sir Terry Pratchett, one of my favourite authors and embodies ‘being more Terry’ with his chilled demeanour, fluffy kindness and simple love of life and everyone in it.

Caroline Mott - Technical editor and proof reader: Caroline is so knowledgeable, it is terrifying.  Caroline’s proof reading skills, patience and incredible sense of humour have added so much to the creation and realisation of this project, beautifully encapsulated by this comment  “Claire, are we using full stops or not? Pick a team my love, at the moment it’s all a bit, shall we say, random.”

Lucy Monkman - Illustrator: I’ve chosen this talented local illustrator to create some beautiful, inspiring content for you to colour.  I love Lucy’s fresh and joyful illustrations and am very excited to be working with her, find out more about Lucy and her work here https://lucymonkman.com/

Annina Diston - Graphic Design: Annina brings her unique, exquisite style and attention to detail to the project, find out more about her at her website https://anninadiston.com/

Printing and creative print production - Exactis Interactive Print:  all the associated excitement of creative print production is in the capable hands of Lucy and the team at Exactis  https://www.exactis.co.uk/ a wonderful bunch of people whose enthusiasm and ‘can do’ attitude has helped me make it to this point.
George Tyson has provided anatomical illustrations.
Beta testing & usability:  In order to ensure that the ideas and exercises contained in the book are practical and effective, I enlisted the help of a team of volunteer beta testes whose feedback has been extremely valuable, enabling me to ensure that the finished product is accessible and supportive, providing a completely stand alone resource that can be utilised by anyone who is interested to find out more about themselves and ready to make positive changes to enhance their own lives.  There are too many to mention individually here but they are all acknowledged in the book itself for their altruistic contribution to the project.
Risks & Challenges
I’ve done my assessment and and much of the risk has been minimised.
I’ve regularly kept in touch with my team along the way and continue to liaise with them.  They are ready to roll when their input is required.  
I’ve explored quite a few ‘what if’ scenarios and they mostly impact not enough sales, fortunately, this project does not need much capital to get the last bits done so, if we come in under target we just print less copies.  If we get loads of support and huge numbers of orders to fulfill I have contingencies in place to help with this. 
Other Ways You Can Help
Wow, thank you for reading this far, I really appreciate it.
I totally understand that for some of you reading this making any financial contribution right now may just not be possible and that’s cool, feeling your supportive vibe is adding an extra grease to my wheels.  
Contributions aren’t always about money though so, if you’d like to support what I’m doing in some other way please spread the word and let other people know about this campaign, either share this to your own contacts, direct people to my website of use some of Indiegogo’s great sharing tools. 
Whatever you do to get the word out, thank you, you have helped me to get my dream out of my head and into the world and I appreciate that.

story:
Meditation in Life

I've always known I was a spiritual person and needed spiritual training to reach my full potential. In 2002, I walked into the Chagdud Gonpa Tromge Ling meditation center, and immediately knew I was home. It was there that I was introduced to the late Lama Chödak Gyatso Nubpa and Lama Zangpo and received guidance to start my spiritual journey. Later in 2006, Lama Tsering gave me instructions to follow through and complete the Ngondro practices.

For those of you who are not familiar with Tibetan Buddhism, Ngondro is a powerful and profound collection of foundational practices that prepares one for deep transformation. It is a preliminary practice that, once completed, allows one to receive further teachings. After ten years, I finished my first Ngondro.

I am grateful that years of practice has brought me to where I am today. 

In 2011, I was offered the opportunity to serve as a staff member at Rigdzin Ling.  As fast as I could, I left my job, hopped in the car, drove 2000 miles from Minnesota to California, and I have never looked back. 

Every moment I've lived at Rigdzin Ling, I've been in the presence of Chagdud Tulku Rinpoche's blessings and I am grateful to live a life where my spiritual practice is very significant. I am learning generosity through my actions: managing the butterlamp house, maintaning acres of gardens, supporting ritual arts in the shrine room, and helping as needed around the land.

I am passionate about living at Rigdzin Ling as a volunteer, to live and support the dharma, but as a full-time volunteer my financial resources have become limited. 


Gardening with Rigdzin Ling dog.                  Singing butterlamp prayers.

Drumming in the shrine.


What I Am Asking For 

The teachings offered to students who have finished their Ngondro practice within this tradition are only given once a year in January at Khadro Ling, Brazil. The training will be rigorous with long hours for 29 days straight.  

Now is the time to attend these teachings, because I have the time to do so.  Like most folks, when I have been employed in healthcare, I did not have much vacation time beyond a week or two, even though I had the financial resources for extended travel. And while I have the time now, my financial resources are limited, which is why I am asking for your help.  

The costs, in US dollars, for the retreat will be as follows:

Item Cost Update
Retreat tuition with room and board 1500 covered by indiegogo
Housing: 4 nights before & 4 nights after retreat 300 covered by indiegogo
Airflight RT - Sacramento to Sao Paulo 0 covered by air miles
Airflight RT - Sao Paulo to Porto Alegre 225 covered by donor
Taxi RT - Porto Alegre to Khadro Ling 130 covered by indiegogo
Taxi RT - Sao Paulo airport to Odsal Ling 200 cancelled
Shuttle RT - Redding to Sacramento 130 covered by indiegogo
Non-retreat day costs, laundry, texts, etc 458 covered by indiegogo
Total 2943

Like many dedicated practitioners, I've spent my financial resources making it to this milestone.  I appreciate your help in taking my training to the next level.

The Impact

Attending this retreat will allow me to be part of this great tradition of meditation and will deepen the Buddhist practices that I have integrated into my life.   From this I will be more capable of serving others with kindness, compassion, and wisdom wherever life takes me.

I have trained for the last ten years believing my efforts can be an inspiration to others and bring greater peace and happiness to all beings. Please help me continue on my mission. 

Ways You Can Help

Contributions in all amounts are of great service and are appreciated.  All funds that exceed the campaign goal will be donated to the scholarship fund at Chagdud Gonpa Rigdzin Ling.  

You can also help by posting this campaign to your Facebook page, and emailing your friends, families, and sanghas.

If you have your own idea on how you'd like to help - please let me know! 

If you are unsure or have any questions, Lama Padma, current Lama-in-residence at Rigdzin Ling, is available for questions relating to this campaign. To schedule a call, please contact Abby at 1-530-623-2714, ext. 126.

Butterlamps at Rigdzin Ling.

Ways We Can Help

The team at Rigdzin Ling provides the daily service of prayers for those listed on the Removal of Obstacles list.  If you would like to be placed on the Removal of Obstacles list or if you would like to place the name of a person or an animal you know that is in need, please state this request in the Comments section above. I ensure you the name you requested will be placed on the Removal of Obstacles prayer list.

story:
If you suffer from binge eating disorder you are advised to either just “manage” binge eating or lifetime avoidance of trigger foods.  (Click play on the video above) 

The Binge Code is a bold new book based on hard science and years of experience helping people end their binge eating problems. 

It teaches a brand new approach to end binge eating and get people back living life to the fullest.

Accompanying the book is an app that helps you achieve your goal and an online community to support you. You get all the tools you need to break free from binge eating and ensure lasting success. 

This blend of information, technology and community support gets fast results.

I NEED YOUR HELP

I need your help to get the word out there that there is an alternative approach to treating binge eating. The money raised here will be spent entirely on marketing the book and helping to spread the message. 

BUT THAT'S NOT ALL 

For every $10 raised I will sponsor a person (who cannot afford it) onto one of my online training programs as well as giving them a digital copy of the book. So not only will your pledge be helping you, it will also be helping people who cannot afford it, access to the materials that they need. 

PERKS OFFERED

HOW THE MONEY WILL BE SPENT 

10% on mailing copies to journalists and media outlets. 
15% on advertising in online trade publications 
50% on online advertising (Google/ Amazon/ Facebook/ Twitter )
25% on a book publicist for U.S. and Europe

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

The book, app and online support are all ready and can be delivered immediately to all backers once the campaign ends. The real challenge is to raise enough funds to get the message out there to as many people as possible as well as making an impact with key people on radio and TV.

story:
Why Support My Beyond Boundaries Equine Retreat?

Because horses talk to all of us, and we all have the potential to hear what they say...

How The Idea Was Born 

When I was a child and I had the opportunity to be in the same space as a horse, I remember there was a feeling of sharing. We knew who we were. Their gentleness and love was natural. They saw the same love in me, they expected it. It felt like being at home in a place we never needed to leave. 

I was often attracted to horses who were said to be difficult or dangerous because the togetherness feeling was often stronger with them. As long as I could be still and listen. 

Then I grew up and began to absorb different teachings. Most of the time they were about how to control and subdue a horse. That was just how things were done. I became ambitious and started to compete in Show Jumping and then Dressage. 

One day when I was twenty years old, I was preparing to compete in a Dressage competition in Edinburgh. I was riding my own young mare I had trained myself, and suddenly I realised that although we were both together in this collecting ring, it was the last place she wanted to be. I felt rejected and miserable because I understood that the natural love I used to share with horses in the beginning was gone. 

I devoted the next twenty years of my life finding it again. First I learned what horses need from us physically and emotionally by listening to their state of being, and gradually the ability to perceive that grew and developed. 

I have begun to teach and share this connection with other horse guardians and their ability is very exciting. They feel it too! And it is transforming their equine relationships already. 

It has recently become clear that creating an Equine Retreat Centre where groups of horse lovers of any experience can come and absorb this language is the way forward. Although it may start out as a trickle, the movement will grow and strengthen and ultimately a whole new perspective on having horses in our lives will flourish. 

My Background

My name is Camille Dareau, I am 43 years old and have been learning from horses since I was a child. I trained as a Craniosacral Therapist in my twenties and have been continuing to develop a therapeutic approach to horse keeping and horse training since then. When I understood how powerful the innate healing intelligence of all living creatures is, it seemed like the answer to many issues that come up in life in general. 

Along with my sister we learned the value of a holistic way of looking after horses. Starting with barefoot, then stable-free and rug-free and allowing horses to choose their own companions and live as a herd. Now I even encourage them to choose their own minerals and medicinal herbs. We also studied in depth how it was possible to ride and train horses in a way that was therapeutic for both horse and rider. I was particularly interested in rehabilitating traumatised horses. This led to my personal awakening to the energetic connection, and I have been learning how to communicate with horses in this way ever since. 

After my husband and I were married for a couple of years we were able to move into our beautiful farm, Labarrére, here in the South West of France. It took all of our resources to be able to accomplish this. We have been through some testing times, but they have only made our resolve to succeed here stronger. Founding the Beyond Boundaries Equine Retreat will create a home for the energetic connection, the 'voice of the horses', where it can grow and flourish. Your support is about investing in an awakening of consciousness for horse owners which could profoundly improve the lives of future generations of horses.  

What We Need To Create The Retreat Centre

I have always reinvested my own money and that of my wonderful supporters into supporting my herd of horses and funding my work with them. This has enabled my approach to be shared with other horse guardians. At this point we have reached an impasse and we need help to reach the next level. The money we raise from this campaign will be used for the project in the following ways:

  • To finish the outdoor horse arena i.e drainage, surfacing and fencing.
  • To add a second bathroom for guests in the farmhouse.
  • To expand the kitchen area in order to provide dining for our guests.
  • To continue to develop course material for the Beyond Boundaries Equine Retreat. 
  • To advertise the Beyond Boundaries Equine Retreat. 
  • To provide linens and hospitality infrastructure for our guests. 

Our intention is to begin offering the retreats as soon as possible. We would like to begin welcoming participants as early as June and July Summer 2019.  Our priority for the funds we receive will be the facilities to accommodate guests.

 

What The Retreat Can Offer Participants

One of my strengths is to merge boundaries and bring concepts which are apparently separate, together. There are so many boundaries in the equestrian world. Natural Horsemanship and Classical Dressage for example, or even simpler, flat work and jumping. There are always underlying connections to be made, however. Whoever you are and whatever discipline you practice with horses, one of the most important things, if not the most important thing for you, is your relationship with your horse. If that isn't working, then nothing is working. 

This is why the Beyond Boundaries Equine retreat is so valuable. It doesn't matter what your experience is, we all have something to learn about relationships, and going beneath all of the 'doing' and the 'making' is where those answers are found. 

The retreat is divided into six topics for six days. It starts out more general, addressing the ways horses behave in a herd, and how we as humans can be part of that. Throughout the week we will go deeper into the essence of communication, how we can genuinely dialogue and read horses, and to have an in-depth understanding of the influence we are have. By the last day we are moving into the pure energetic language that exists between us. It is a magical experience to be 'seen' by a horse, sometimes for the first time. 

It sounds like an exaggeration to say that this week could change your life, but this work has done that many times already for many horse lovers. It is not about imposing a plan of action which will change your horse's behaviour and solve all of your problems overnight. Those 'magic bullet' approaches can create more harm than they ever resolve. This immersive experience is about discovering the resources you already have inside you. Once you have found them, they are a doorway to a new space with horses. It is about stepping into another awareness where you feel  the horse in a way that:

  • Gives you confidence because you understand why you were afraid. 
  • Enables you to perceive how your horse feels.
  • Allows you to see the source of your horse's behaviour as well as your own. 
  • Teaches you how to follow your perception and trust your own intuition. 
  • Shows you how to touch your horse in a way that is therapeutic for them and you. 
  • Encourages you to discover the exciting new world of energetic dialogue.

Although this retreat can certainly be a springboard for other activities with horses, it is not a riding holiday. I do believe that riding can be the ultimate horse human connection, although often it is when most of the damage to the relationship is done. Learning a different foundation means that all of those mistakes can be resolved. This is an opportunity to start over again right at the beginning. To get back to that sharing place. The time before anything went wrong, or simply where the magic begins. Most of us think we know horses. If I have learned one thing, it is that we don't, not really. There is a vast undiscovered realm yet to be experienced, and this could be your way in. 

The Beyond Boundaries equine retreat is not teaching you what to do or even how to be, it is about connecting you back to the wisdom you already possess. Your own limitless potential. 

The Retreat Schedule 

Everyone will arrive in the evening so we have a chance to talk (horses) and get to know each other a bit. The Summer evenings in Southwest France are usually balmy and beautiful, and the horses are not far away. Everyone will receive a handbook with the activities for the week and notes, so they can relax and not have to think about writing things down. There will be space for personal notes also, to remember lightbulb moments and experiences. Every day we will have a group discussion in the early evening to answer any questions and further explore the ideas and experiences of the day. 

1. Herd Dynamics: 

  1. In the morning we will be spending time with the herd and observing their relationships. The idea is to get to know the herd and see how they behave around each other so that we can understand how to enter their world safely. Not everyone has had the opportunity to become truly comfortable around horses living in their own world. We need that skill to be able to let go of the control mechanisms we have built up for horses. For example, if you feel happier when your horse has a head-collar on, or equally if your horse seems better behaved with a head-collar on, then there is an unresolved communication issue in the relationship. 
  2. We will have a group discussion about safety in the herd, including where to position ourselves and how to respond in different situations. 
  3. We will have a group exercise addressing knowing our own energy and what we are bringing to the horses. 
  4. In the afternoon we will be working within the herd on an individual basis, or in pairs, to experience the reality of feeling comfortable interacting with the herd of horses.

2. Intelligent Touch:

  1. We will start in the morning discussing the concept of choice and how it applies to horses.

  2. Followed by a practical session, starting with a demonstration of how to ask a horse for their permission. Both asking and reading the horse’s responses is a fascinating process and encourages us to develop a more sensitive awareness of the way horses express themselves.

  3. In the afternoon we will be exploring therapeutic grooming. Therapeutic grooming makes the practice of grooming into a meditation and a therapy. It is a way to create trust through acknowledgement of the horse's feelings. These feelings are usually physical, but may be emotional also. Most of the exercises we do will be demonstrated and then there will be plenty of opportunity for participants to practice and experience it for themselves. 

3. Mutual Yielding 

  1. We will start off in perhaps more familiar territory by using yielding of the horse as another line of communication. The purpose is not so much about controlling the horse or the situation, but learning how to speak their language through this particular form of physical connection. It is very much about bonding and mutual trust as opposed to separation which some forms of yielding can result in. 

  2. In the afternoon the subject becomes less familiar when we start to explore our own ability to yield. many of us have been deeply conditioned that this is not a good idea, that we have to ‘be the boss’ and have our boundaries respected. I have come to understand that true harmony can only come from mutual vulnerability, which is the same as mutual trust. Until we can understand how to yield to a horse, we will not experience the flow of an authentic partnership.

4. Introducing Equipment

  1. We will start by discussing the difference between having an agenda and an intention when it comes to working with horses.
  2. Then we will look at introducing a head-collar, how to do so in dialogue with a horse. Participants will be able to practice with individual horses and explore their own ability to perceive the communication. 
  3. In the afternoon we will follow a similar plan, but this time working with potentially more contentious equipment, such as bridles and saddles. I don't use bits anymore, but even so, any tack that a horse associates with being ridden can bring up negative associations. We will see how to work with and resolve these issues. 

5. Connected Guidance 

  1. This is a development of yielding with a horse which is beginning to introduce straightness and therefore balance. We will see how physical guidance through contact becomes less physical and more energetic as the connection is established between human and horse.
  2. Everyone will have a chance to practice this, both in the morning and afternoon. 

6. Perceiving The Boundaries

  1. The last day we will be ready to explore more deeply into the energetic connection and what it really feels like in relation to horses. We will start with the herd, who everyone will be familiar with by now, and focus on what it is to perceive their boundary. This can be a magical experience, and often it will open up a new dimension of understanding.
  2. We will move on to feeling individual horse's boundaries and explore what they represent how to respond to them.
  3. In the afternoon we will have a final group discussion which will consolidate what we have done and talk about how to continue to evolve at home with everyone's own horses. 

Extras by Arrangement

Some further opportunities we can offer guests during their stay:

  • Craniosacral Therapy session. 
  • Therapeutic Riding Session.
  • Early morning wood walks with the dogs. (no extra charge!)
  • Crystal bowl session. 
  • Evening meal at a French restaurant with delicious food. 

Personal Reasons For You To Support Our Venture 

Maybe you are a horse owner who is searching for a new way to relate to your horse. Maybe you have discarded some techniques and are experimenting with others, yet you still find there is something missing. Maybe you are experiencing some level of stress or conflict coming between you and your horse(s). This retreat is the perfect opportunity to move through the language barrier into a more profound relationship with your horse. Think of it as a step by step guide to confidence and mutual comprehension. Are any of these questions familiar? 

  1. Do you feel nervous standing near or around horses, in a herd or individually?
  2. Does it seem more comfortable for you when you have a head-collar on your horse? 
  3. Do you worry about how your horse will behave in a strange situation? 
  4. Do you frequently feel in danger of being shoved or stepped on by horses? 
  5. Is there a behaviour in your horse you want to fix, but don't know how?
  6. Is your relationship with your horse based solely around food? 
  7. Do you wish you felt inspired to spend more time with your horses? 

These questions do not carry any judgment, if you haven't been in those situations or experiences some of those feelings then you probably haven't been around horses very much! There are solutions, and they are solutions which will bring you closer to every horse you come into contact with as well as closer to understanding yourself. Best of all they don't have to involve force and pushing yourself to be someone you are not. 

Some more benefits that participants can enjoy:

  • This is an introduction to a new way of relating to horses which can transform your life.

  • Achieving  greater understanding of your emotional/physical self and how it influences horses.

  • Experiences with happy, holistic horses who are also wise and generous teachers.

  • A valuable opportunity to acknowledge and release negative horse-related experiences.

  • Great company in beautiful surroundings with delicious food!

  • Ongoing support with your own horse/herd. 

  • Gaining the experience to share your understanding further in the horse world. 

How To Help Rescued And Traumatised Horses

I mentioned at the top that as  child I felt a particular bond with troubled horses. There are many horses who have suffered at the hands of ignorance and human ambition. I have been particularly passionate in my life to help such horses find their horse-ness again, and that has been educational and healing in itself.  

I do believe that we need them as much, if not more than they  need us. Horses are deeply spiritual beings. The energy we bring in our relationships with them can open a healing channel which flows both ways.

The key to healing is being able to acknowledge what is there, both in ourselves and in our horses. The Beyond Boundaries Equine Retreat is a map which guides that path. The horses in my life have demonstrated time after time the possibilities, and the potential for healing which exists. If you have a horse with issues, and you have some issues with horses, feel inspired to find your solution! It certainly exists.  

Discover The Perks 

We have a great reward system for people who choose to donate to our cause which will start you off on my horse-friendly approach even if you can't make it to the retreat itself. There are training eBooks, the Online Course , Awakening Your Energetic Connection , and different options with the retreat itself. I can even come and work with you and your own horses. 

We want you to feel good about supporting us so many of the rewards we are offering already exist and there is no risk that you won't receive them. I have formatting of my second training ebook to finish, it that will be ready this summer. The work/renovation needed to be complete so that we may accommodate guests can be done relatively quickly when we have the financial green light. Everything else is already waiting to go.

We believe very strongly that this project will succeed and that contributors will discover an extra dimension in their horsemanship which will unfold a whole new world of possibilities for them. This is already happening for many of my present clients. 

I have always put my horses and other people's horses well-being first. I have not hesitated to help whether it was financially justifiable or not, I feel that the karma from this will keep opening the right doors and continue to support the work I feel so dedicated to. 

If you are not a horse owner, but are interested in energy/healing work, we can arrange non-horsey rewards. If you would like to help in a practical way with building fences or renovation work for example, don't hesitate to get in touch! 

Recommending and sharing our campaign in any way will help us greatly if you are not able to contribute financially. You can use the Indiegogo share tools to do this, or send the link via social media, Thank you so much! We are grateful you took the time to learn more about the Beyond Boundaries Equine Retreat!
story_txt:
Why Support My Beyond Boundaries Equine Retreat?
Because horses talk to all of us, and we all have the potential to hear what they say...

How The Idea Was Born 
When I was a child and I had the opportunity to be in the same space as a horse, I remember there was a feeling of sharing. We knew who we were. Their gentleness and love was natural. They saw the same love in me, they expected it. It felt like being at home in a place we never needed to leave. 
I was often attracted to horses who were said to be difficult or dangerous because the togetherness feeling was often stronger with them. As long as I could be still and listen. 
Then I grew up and began to absorb different teachings. Most of the time they were about how to control and subdue a horse. That was just how things were done. I became ambitious and started to compete in Show Jumping and then Dressage. 
One day when I was twenty years old, I was preparing to compete in a Dressage competition in Edinburgh. I was riding my own young mare I had trained myself, and suddenly I realised that although we were both together in this collecting ring, it was the last place she wanted to be. I felt rejected and miserable because I understood that the natural love I used to share with horses in the beginning was gone. 
I devoted the next twenty years of my life finding it again. First I learned what horses need from us physically and emotionally by listening to their state of being, and gradually the ability to perceive that grew and developed. 
I have begun to teach and share this connection with other horse guardians and their ability is very exciting. They feel it too! And it is transforming their equine relationships already. 
It has recently become clear that creating an Equine Retreat Centre where groups of horse lovers of any experience can come and absorb this language is the way forward. Although it may start out as a trickle, the movement will grow and strengthen and ultimately a whole new perspective on having horses in our lives will flourish. 
My Background
My name is Camille Dareau, I am 43 years old and have been learning from horses since I was a child. I trained as a Craniosacral Therapist in my twenties and have been continuing to develop a therapeutic approach to horse keeping and horse training since then. When I understood how powerful the innate healing intelligence of all living creatures is, it seemed like the answer to many issues that come up in life in general. 
Along with my sister we learned the value of a holistic way of looking after horses. Starting with barefoot, then stable-free and rug-free and allowing horses to choose their own companions and live as a herd. Now I even encourage them to choose their own minerals and medicinal herbs. We also studied in depth how it was possible to ride and train horses in a way that was therapeutic for both horse and rider. I was particularly interested in rehabilitating traumatised horses. This led to my personal awakening to the energetic connection, and I have been learning how to communicate with horses in this way ever since. 
After my husband and I were married for a couple of years we were able to move into our beautiful farm, Labarrére, here in the South West of France. It took all of our resources to be able to accomplish this. We have been through some testing times, but they have only made our resolve to succeed here stronger. Founding the Beyond Boundaries Equine Retreat will create a home for the energetic connection, the 'voice of the horses', where it can grow and flourish. Your support is about investing in an awakening of consciousness for horse owners which could profoundly improve the lives of future generations of horses.  

What We Need To Create The Retreat Centre
I have always reinvested my own money and that of my wonderful supporters into supporting my herd of horses and funding my work with them. This has enabled my approach to be shared with other horse guardians. At this point we have reached an impasse and we need help to reach the next level. The money we raise from this campaign will be used for the project in the following ways:

To finish the outdoor horse arena i.e drainage, surfacing and fencing.
To add a second bathroom for guests in the farmhouse.
To expand the kitchen area in order to provide dining for our guests.
To continue to develop course material for the Beyond Boundaries Equine Retreat. 
To advertise the Beyond Boundaries Equine Retreat. 
To provide linens and hospitality infrastructure for our guests. 

Our intention is to begin offering the retreats as soon as possible. We would like to begin welcoming participants as early as June and July Summer 2019.  Our priority for the funds we receive will be the facilities to accommodate guests.
 
What The Retreat Can Offer Participants

One of my strengths is to merge boundaries and bring concepts which are apparently separate, together. There are so many boundaries in the equestrian world. Natural Horsemanship and Classical Dressage for example, or even simpler, flat work and jumping. There are always underlying connections to be made, however. Whoever you are and whatever discipline you practice with horses, one of the most important things, if not the most important thing for you, is your relationship with your horse. If that isn't working, then nothing is working. 
This is why the Beyond Boundaries Equine retreat is so valuable. It doesn't matter what your experience is, we all have something to learn about relationships, and going beneath all of the 'doing' and the 'making' is where those answers are found. 
The retreat is divided into six topics for six days. It starts out more general, addressing the ways horses behave in a herd, and how we as humans can be part of that. Throughout the week we will go deeper into the essence of communication, how we can genuinely dialogue and read horses, and to have an in-depth understanding of the influence we are have. By the last day we are moving into the pure energetic language that exists between us. It is a magical experience to be 'seen' by a horse, sometimes for the first time. 
It sounds like an exaggeration to say that this week could change your life, but this work has done that many times already for many horse lovers. It is not about imposing a plan of action which will change your horse's behaviour and solve all of your problems overnight. Those 'magic bullet' approaches can create more harm than they ever resolve. This immersive experience is about discovering the resources you already have inside you. Once you have found them, they are a doorway to a new space with horses. It is about stepping into another awareness where you feel  the horse in a way that:

Gives you confidence because you understand why you were afraid. 

Enables you to perceive how your horse feels.
Allows you to see the source of your horse's behaviour as well as your own. 
Teaches you how to follow your perception and trust your own intuition. 
Shows you how to touch your horse in a way that is therapeutic for them and you. 
Encourages you to discover the exciting new world of energetic dialogue.

Although this retreat can certainly be a springboard for other activities with horses, it is not a riding holiday. I do believe that riding can be the ultimate horse human connection, although often it is when most of the damage to the relationship is done. Learning a different foundation means that all of those mistakes can be resolved. This is an opportunity to start over again right at the beginning. To get back to that sharing place. The time before anything went wrong, or simply where the magic begins. Most of us think we know horses. If I have learned one thing, it is that we don't, not really. There is a vast undiscovered realm yet to be experienced, and this could be your way in. 
The Beyond Boundaries equine retreat is not teaching you what to do or even how to be, it is about connecting you back to the wisdom you already possess. Your own limitless potential. 

The Retreat Schedule 
Everyone will arrive in the evening so we have a chance to talk (horses) and get to know each other a bit. The Summer evenings in Southwest France are usually balmy and beautiful, and the horses are not far away. Everyone will receive a handbook with the activities for the week and notes, so they can relax and not have to think about writing things down. There will be space for personal notes also, to remember lightbulb moments and experiences. Every day we will have a group discussion in the early evening to answer any questions and further explore the ideas and experiences of the day. 
1. Herd Dynamics: 

In the morning we will be spending time with the herd and observing their relationships. The idea is to get to know the herd and see how they behave around each other so that we can understand how to enter their world safely. Not everyone has had the opportunity to become truly comfortable around horses living in their own world. We need that skill to be able to let go of the control mechanisms we have built up for horses. For example, if you feel happier when your horse has a head-collar on, or equally if your horse seems better behaved with a head-collar on, then there is an unresolved communication issue in the relationship. 
We will have a group discussion about safety in the herd, including where to position ourselves and how to respond in different situations. 
We will have a group exercise addressing knowing our own energy and what we are bringing to the horses. 
In the afternoon we will be working within the herd on an individual basis, or in pairs, to experience the reality of feeling comfortable interacting with the herd of horses.

2. Intelligent Touch:

We will start in the morning discussing the concept of choice and how it applies to horses.
Followed by a practical session, starting with a demonstration of how to ask a horse for their permission. Both asking and reading the horse’s responses is a fascinating process and encourages us to develop a more sensitive awareness of the way horses express themselves.
In the afternoon we will be exploring therapeutic grooming. Therapeutic grooming makes the practice of grooming into a meditation and a therapy. It is a way to create trust through acknowledgement of the horse's feelings. These feelings are usually physical, but may be emotional also. Most of the exercises we do will be demonstrated and then there will be plenty of opportunity for participants to practice and experience it for themselves. 

3. Mutual Yielding 

We will start off in perhaps more familiar territory by using yielding of the horse as another line of communication. The purpose is not so much about controlling the horse or the situation, but learning how to speak their language through this particular form of physical connection. It is very much about bonding and mutual trust as opposed to separation which some forms of yielding can result in. 
In the afternoon the subject becomes less familiar when we start to explore our own ability to yield. many of us have been deeply conditioned that this is not a good idea, that we have to ‘be the boss’ and have our boundaries respected. I have come to understand that true harmony can only come from mutual vulnerability, which is the same as mutual trust. Until we can understand how to yield to a horse, we will not experience the flow of an authentic partnership.

4. Introducing Equipment

We will start by discussing the difference between having an agenda and an intention when it comes to working with horses.
Then we will look at introducing a head-collar, how to do so in dialogue with a horse. Participants will be able to practice with individual horses and explore their own ability to perceive the communication. 
In the afternoon we will follow a similar plan, but this time working with potentially more contentious equipment, such as bridles and saddles. I don't use bits anymore, but even so, any tack that a horse associates with being ridden can bring up negative associations. We will see how to work with and resolve these issues. 

5. Connected Guidance 

This is a development of yielding with a horse which is beginning to introduce straightness and therefore balance. We will see how physical guidance through contact becomes less physical and more energetic as the connection is established between human and horse.

Everyone will have a chance to practice this, both in the morning and afternoon. 

6. Perceiving The Boundaries

The last day we will be ready to explore more deeply into the energetic connection and what it really feels like in relation to horses. We will start with the herd, who everyone will be familiar with by now, and focus on what it is to perceive their boundary. This can be a magical experience, and often it will open up a new dimension of understanding.
We will move on to feeling individual horse's boundaries and explore what they represent how to respond to them.
In the afternoon we will have a final group discussion which will consolidate what we have done and talk about how to continue to evolve at home with everyone's own horses. 


Extras by Arrangement
Some further opportunities we can offer guests during their stay:

Craniosacral Therapy session. 
Therapeutic Riding Session.
Early morning wood walks with the dogs. (no extra charge!)
Crystal bowl session. 
Evening meal at a French restaurant with delicious food. 

Personal Reasons For You To Support Our Venture 
Maybe you are a horse owner who is searching for a new way to relate to your horse. Maybe you have discarded some techniques and are experimenting with others, yet you still find there is something missing. Maybe you are experiencing some level of stress or conflict coming between you and your horse(s). This retreat is the perfect opportunity to move through the language barrier into a more profound relationship with your horse. Think of it as a step by step guide to confidence and mutual comprehension. Are any of these questions familiar? 

Do you feel nervous standing near or around horses, in a herd or individually?
Does it seem more comfortable for you when you have a head-collar on your horse? 
Do you worry about how your horse will behave in a strange situation? 
Do you frequently feel in danger of being shoved or stepped on by horses? 
Is there a behaviour in your horse you want to fix, but don't know how?
Is your relationship with your horse based solely around food? 
Do you wish you felt inspired to spend more time with your horses? 

These questions do not carry any judgment, if you haven't been in those situations or experiences some of those feelings then you probably haven't been around horses very much! There are solutions, and they are solutions which will bring you closer to every horse you come into contact with as well as closer to understanding yourself. Best of all they don't have to involve force and pushing yourself to be someone you are not. 
Some more benefits that participants can enjoy:

This is an introduction to a new way of relating to horses which can transform your life.
Achieving  greater understanding of your emotional/physical self and how it influences horses.
Experiences with happy, holistic horses who are also wise and generous teachers.
A valuable opportunity to acknowledge and release negative horse-related experiences.
Great company in beautiful surroundings with delicious food!
Ongoing support with your own horse/herd. 
Gaining the experience to share your understanding further in the horse world. 

How To Help Rescued And Traumatised Horses
I mentioned at the top that as  child I felt a particular bond with troubled horses. There are many horses who have suffered at the hands of ignorance and human ambition. I have been particularly passionate in my life to help such horses find their horse-ness again, and that has been educational and healing in itself.  
I do believe that we need them as much, if not more than they  need us. Horses are deeply spiritual beings. The energy we bring in our relationships with them can open a healing channel which flows both ways.
The key to healing is being able to acknowledge what is there, both in ourselves and in our horses. The Beyond Boundaries Equine Retreat is a map which guides that path. The horses in my life have demonstrated time after time the possibilities, and the potential for healing which exists. If you have a horse with issues, and you have some issues with horses, feel inspired to find your solution! It certainly exists.  
Discover The Perks 

We have a great reward system for people who choose to donate to our cause which will start you off on my horse-friendly approach even if you can't make it to the retreat itself. There are training eBooks, the Online Course , Awakening Your Energetic Connection , and different options with the retreat itself. I can even come and work with you and your own horses. 
We want you to feel good about supporting us so many of the rewards we are offering already exist and there is no risk that you won't receive them. I have formatting of my second training ebook to finish, it that will be ready this summer. The work/renovation needed to be complete so that we may accommodate guests can be done relatively quickly when we have the financial green light. Everything else is already waiting to go.
